T06asabhs_u:8: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaśca // dhātavo
T06asabhs_u:10: cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuścakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhāturghrāṇadhāturgandhadhāturghrāṇavijñānadhāturjivhādhātū rasadhāturjivhāvijñānadhātuḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhāturmanodhāturdharmadhāturmanovijñānadhātuśca // āyatanāni dvadaśa /
T06asabhs_u:11: cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ śrotrāyatanaṃ śabdāyatanaṃ ghrāṇāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ manaāyatanaṃ dharmāyatanaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:14: saparigrahadehātmavastu upabhogātmavastu abhilāpātmavastu sarvadharmādharmābhisaṃskārātmavastu (Abhidh-s 2) tadāśrayātmasvastu copādāya // kimupādāya dhātovo 'ṣṭādaśaiva /
T06asabhs_u:27: kasmād dhātava āyatanāni ca sopādānadharmā ityucyante /
T06asabhs_u:36: deśena rūpaṇa midaṃ cedaṃ ca rūpamevaṃ caivaṃ ca rūpamiti praṇihitāpraṇihitacetovitarkeṇa pratibimbacitrīkāratā // kiṃlakṣaṇā vedanā /
T06asabhs_u:38: nānāvidhānāṃ śubhaśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavantyanenetyanubhavaḥ // kiṃlakṣaṇā saṃjñā /
T06asabhs_u:40: saṃjñā nānādharmapratibimbodgrahaṇa (svabhāvā) yayā draṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānarthān vyavaharati // kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ saṃskāraḥ /
T06asabhs_u:42: saṃskārabhisaṃskāra (svabhāvo) yena kuśalākuśalāvyakṛteṣu pakṣeṣu cittaṃ prerayati /
T06asabhs_u:46: vijñānaṃ yena rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmān nānā viṣayān vijānāti //
T06asabhs_u:48: yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭavān paśyati yacca tasya bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ taccakṣuḥ // yathā cakṣurdhātulakṣaṇaṃ tathā śrotraghrāṇajihyakāyamanodhātūnāmapi lakṣaṇāni /
T06asabhs_u:50: rūpaṃ yaccakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate ca yacca tatra cakṣurdhātorādhipatyaṃ tadrūpadhātu lakṣaṇam
T06asabhs_u:51: yathā rūpadhātu lakṣaṇaṃ tathā śabdagandharasasparśadharmadhātūnāmapi lakṣaṇāni /
T06asabhs_u:53: cakṣurāśrayā rūpālambanā rūpaprativijñaptiḥ yacca tasya bījamupacitaṃ /
T06asabhs_u:59: yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ taccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya // katamāni catvāri
T06asabhs_u:60: / pṛthivīdhātuḥ abdhātuḥ tejodhātuḥ vāyudhātuśca // pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:61: kaṭhinatā // abdhātuḥ katamaḥ niṣyandatā // tejodhātuḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:65: cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jivhendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānāmekadeśo dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītaṃ ca rūpam //
T06asabhs_u:67: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya cakṣuvijñānā śrayo rūpaprasādaḥ // śrotrendriyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:70: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya ghrāṇavijñānāśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ // jivhendriyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:71: catvāri mahabhūtānyupādāya jivhāvijñānaśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ // kāyendriyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:75: yathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmamunnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātamātapaḥ chāyā āloko
T06asabhs_u:77: abhyavakāśarūpaṃ vijñaptirūpaṃ nabha ekavarṇaṃ rūpam // tat (Abhidh-s 4) punastridhā /
T06asabhs_u:80: manojño vā amanojño vā ubhayaviparīto vā /
T06asabhs_u:81: upāttamahābhūtahetuko vā anupāttamahābhūtahetuko vā tadubhayo bālokaprasiddho vā siddhopanīto vā parikalpito vā āryairdeśito vā tīrthaidaśito vā /
T06asabhs_u:84: yathā surabhirasurabhiḥ samagandhaḥ sahajagandhaḥ sāṃyogikagandhaḥ pāriṇāmikagandhaśca // rasaḥ katama /
T06asabhs_u:87: manojño vā amanojño vā ubhayaviparīto vā sahajo vā sāṃyogiko vā pāriṇāmiko vā // spraṣṭavyaikadeśaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:89: ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ laghutvaṃ gurūtvaṃ picchilatvaṃ mandatvamamandatvaṃ śītatvamuṣṇatvaṃ jighatsā pipāsā tṛptirbalaṃ daurbalayaṃ mūrcchā kaṇḍūtiḥ
T06asabhs_u:90: pūtirvyādhirjarāmaraṇaṃ klāntirviśrāma ūrjā ca // dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:95: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotraghrāṇajivhākāyamanaḥ saṃsparśajā vedanā // evaṃ ṣaḍvedanā kāyāḥ sukhā vā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā // punaḥ sukhā kāyikī vedanā duḥkhā kāyikī vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā kāyikīvedanā sukhā caitasikī vedanā duḥkhā caitasikī vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā caitasikī vedanā sukhā sāmiṣavedanā duḥkhā sāmiṣavedanā aduḥkhāsukhā sāmiṣavedanā sukhā nirāmiṣavedanā duḥkhā
T06asabhs_u:96: nirāmiṣavedanā aduḥkhāsukhā nirāmiṣavedanā punaḥ sukhā gredhāśritavedanā duḥkhā gredhāśritavedanā aduḥkhāsukhā gredhāśritavedanā sukhā naiṣkramyāśritavedanā duḥkhā naiṣkramyāśritavedanā aduḥkhāsukhā naiṣkramyānnitavedanā ca // kāyikī vedanā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:109: jivhākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā yathā sanimittama pi saṃjānāti animittamapi parīttamapi mahadgata mapyapramāṇamapi nāsti kiṃcidityākiṃcanyāyatanamapi saṃjānāti // sanimittasaṃjñā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:110: avyavahārakuśalasyānimittadhātusamā pannasya bhavāgrasamāpannasya ca saṃjñāṃ sthāpayitvā yāvadanyā saṃjñā // animittasaṃjñā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:111: yā sthāpitā saṃjñā // parīttā saṃjñā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:120: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā cetanā śrotraghrāṇajvihākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā cetanā yayā kuśalatvāya cetayate saṃkleśāya cetayate avasthābhedāya cetayate itīyaṃ cetanā vedanāṃ saṃjñācca sthāpayitvā tadanye caitasikā dharmāścittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraskandha ityucyate // te punaḥ katame manaskāraḥ sparśaḥ cchando 'dhimokṣaḥ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñāśraddhā
T06asabhs_u:123: mithyādṛṣṭi krodha upanāhaḥ mrakṣaḥ pradāśaḥ īrṣyāḥ mātsaryaṃ śāṭhyaṃ mado vihinsā āhrikyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ āśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādo muṣitasmṛtitāsaṃprajanyaṃ vikṣepo middhaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vitarko vicāraśca // cetanā (Abhidh-s 6) katamā /
T06asabhs_u:135: saṃsṛte vastuni cetasaḥ asaṃpramoṣo 'vikṣepakarmikā // samādhiḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:151: sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkha sthānīyeṣu ca dharme ṣvanāghātaḥ
T06asabhs_u:154: vipākato vā āgamato vādhigamato vā jñānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā /
T06asabhs_u:157: kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ sannāhe vā prayoge vā alīnatve vā avyāvṛttau vā asantuṣṭau vā
T06asabhs_u:161: savīryakānalobhādveṣāmohanniśritya yā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmbhāvanā sāsravebhyaśca dharmebhyaścittārakṣā
T06asabhs_u:162: sa ca laukikalokottarasampatti paripūraṇapariniṣpādanakarmakaḥ // upekṣā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:163: savīryakānalobhādveṣāmohānniśritya yā saṃkliṣṭavihāravairodhikī cittasamatā cittapraśaṭhatā cittasyānābhogāvasthitatā /
T06asabhs_u:179: pañcopādānaskandhānātmataḥ ātmīyato vā samanupaśyato yā kṣāntī rūcirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:181: pañcopādānaskandhān śāśva(ta)to vā ucchedato vā samanupaśyataḥ yā kṣāntī
T06asabhs_u:185: dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭayāśrayāṃśca pañcopādānaskandhānagrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣānti rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭi /
T06asabhs_u:187: śīlaṃ vrataṃ śīlavratā(śrayāṃ)śca pañcopādānaskandhān śuddhito muktito
T06asabhs_u:188: nairyāṇikataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣāntī rūcirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:190: hetuṃ vāpavadataḥ phalaṃ vā kriyāṃ vā sadvā vastu nāśayataḥ mithyā ca vikalpayato yā kṣānti rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:194: yā etāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayaḥ āsāṃ kati samāropadṛṣṭayaḥ katyapavāddṛṣṭayaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:195: catasraḥ samāropadṛṣṭayaḥ jñeye svabhāvaviśeṣasamāropatāmupādāya dṛṣṭau cāgraśuddhisamāropatāmupādāya
T06asabhs_u:197: yāśca purvāntakalpikā dṛṣṭayaḥ yāścaparāntakalpikā (Abhidh-s 8) dṛṣṭayaḥ tāḥ katibhyo dṛṣṭibhyo veditavyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:199: yā avyākṛtacastuṣu dṛṣṭayastāḥ katibhyo dṛṣṭibhyo veditavyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:201: kaṃ doṣaṃ paśyatā bhagavatā skandhadhātvāyatanegu pañcamiḥ kāraṇairātmā pratikṣiptaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiparigṛhītān pañca doṣān paśyatā vilakṣaṇatādoṣaṃ anityatādoṣaṃ asvāsthya doṣaṃ nirdehatādoṣaṃ ayatnato mokṣadoṣaṃ ca // yā pañcasūpādānaskadheṣu viṃśatikoṭikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ rūpa[mā]tmeti
T06asabhs_u:203: saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti samanupaśyati vijñānavantamātmānamātmīyaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñāne ātmānaṃ tatra katyātmadṛṣṭayaḥ katyātmīyadṛṣṭayaḥ pañcātmadṛṣṭayaḥ pañcadaśātmīyadṛṣṭayaḥ // kena kāraṇena pañca
T06asabhs_u:211: upanohaḥ katamaḥ tata ūrdhvaṃ pratighāṃśika eva vairāśayasyānutsargaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:218: uccapragāḍhapāruṣyavacanasanniśrayadāna karmakaḥ apuṇyaprasavakarmakaḥ asparśavihārakarmakaśca // īrṣyā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:219: lābhasatkārā dhyavasitasya parasaṃpattiviśeṣe dveṣāṃśikaḥ a[marṣa] kṛtaścetaso vyāropaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:229: ārogyaṃ vā āgamya yauvanaṃ vā dīrghāyuṣkalakṣaṇaṃ vopalabhyanyatamānyatamāṃ vā sāsravāṃ saṃpattiṃ rāgāṃśikannandīsaumanasyam /
T06asabhs_u:247: sakausīdyān rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhāvanā sāsravebhyaśca dharmebhyaścetaso 'nārakṣā /
T06asabhs_u:251: kleśasaṃprayuktā prajñā yayā asaṃviditā kāyavākcittacaryā pravartate /
T06asabhs_u:254: sa punaḥ svabhāvavikṣepaḥ bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ adhyātmavikṣepaḥ nimi(tta) vikṣepaḥ dauṣṭhulyavikṣepaḥ manasikāravikṣepaśca /
T06asabhs_u:258: kuśalaprayuktasya paṃcasu kāmaguṇeṣu cetaso visāraḥ // adhyātmavikṣepaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:262: ahaṃkāramamakārāsmimānapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyamāganya kuśalaprayuktasyotpannotpanneṣu vediteṣvahamiti vā mameti vā asmīti vā udgraho vyavakiraṇā nimittīkāraḥ // manasikāravikṣepaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:263: samapattyantaraṃ vā yānāntaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya saṃśrayato vā yo visāraḥ /
T06asabhs_u:265: middhanimittamāgamya mohāṃśikaścetaso 'bhisaṃkṣepaḥ kuśalaḥ akuśalaḥ avyākṛtaḥ kāle vā akāle vā yukto vā ayukto vā /
T06asabhs_u:270: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā paryeṣako manojalpaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:272: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā pratyavekṣako manojalpaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:275: api khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svavipakṣaprahāṇaṃ karma /
T06asabhs_u:278: prāptirasaṃjñisamāpattinirodhasamāpattirāsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgatā jātirjarā sthitiranityatā nāmakāyāḥ padakāyāḥ vyañjanakāyāḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ pravṛttiḥ pratiniyamo yogaḥ javo 'nukramaḥ
T06asabhs_u:279: kālo deśaḥ saṃkhyā sāmagrī ca // prāptiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:280: kuśalakuśalāṃnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilagbhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:282: śubhakṛtsnavītarāgasyoparyavītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhe asaṃjñisamāpattiriti prajñaptiḥ // nirodhasamāpattiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:283: ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgasya bhavāgrāduccalitasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa (Abhidh-s 11) manasikāreṇāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhe nirodhasamāpattiriti prajñaptiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:287: nikāyasabhāge pūrvakarmāviddhe sthitikālaniyame āyuriti prajñaptiḥ // nikāyasabhāgaḥ katamaḥ
T06asabhs_u:288: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃ stasmin sattvanikāye ātmabhāvasadṛśatāyāṃ nikāyasabhāga iti prajñaptiḥ // jātiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:289: nikāyasabhāge saṃskārāṇāmabhūtvābhāve jātiriti prajñaptiḥ // jarā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:290: nikāyasabhāme saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhānyathātve jareti prajñaptiḥ // sthitiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:291: nikāyasabhāge prabandhāvipraṇāśe sthitiriti prajñaptiḥ // anityatā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:297: vyañjanakāyāḥ katameḥ tadubhayāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu vyañjanakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ
T06asabhs_u:306: hetuphalanānātve pratiniyama iti prajñaptiḥ // yogaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:307: hetuphalānurūpye yoga iti prajñaptiḥ // javaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:312: hetuphalaprabandhapravṛttau kāla iti prajñaptiḥ // deśaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:313: pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarā dharordhvāsu sarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ // saṃkhyā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:314: saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyekaśo bhede saṃkhyeti prajñaptiḥ // sāmagrī katamā /
T06asabhs_u:323: tacca sarvatragaṃ kuśale 'pyakuśale 'pyavyākṛte 'pi sthāpayitvā mārgasabhmukhībhāvaṃ nirodhasamāpattimaśaikṣa bhūmiṃ ca yacca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ
T06asabhs_u:328: cakṣurāśrayā rūpālambanā prati vijñaptiḥ // śrotravijñānaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:337: cakṣurdhātuḥ rūpadhātuḥ śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ ghrāṇadhātuḥ gandhadhātuḥ jivhādhātuḥ rasadhātuḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ mano dhātvekadeśaśca //
T06asabhs_u:340: cakṣurādayaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca // dharmadhātau skandhairasaṃgṛhītaṃ katamat
T06asabhs_u:343: kuśaladharmatathatā akuśaladharmatathatā avyākṛtadharmatathatā ākāśam apratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ āniṃjyaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaśca // kuśaladharmatathatā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:345: sā punarucyate śūnyatā animittaṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ paramārtho dharmādhātuśca //
T06asabhs_u:360: sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca buddha dharmanimittāśrayatāmupādāya // yathā kuśalaladharmatathatā
T06asabhs_u:361: akuśaladharmatathatā avyākṛta dharmatathatā ca jñeyā // ākāśaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:363: yo nirodho na visaṃyogaḥ // pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:366: ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgasya bhāvāgrāduccalitasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāmanasikārapūrvakeṇa asthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca sthāvarāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ // paṃcarūpāṇi vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhāḥ te 'ṣṭau asaṃskṛtā dharmāścaivaṃ te ṣoḍaśa dharmadhātava ucyante /
T06asabhs_u:370: dharmadhāturdharmāyatanam // anene nayena skandhadhātvāyatanāni triṣu dharmeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:378: yathā aṇḍe vā kalale vā arvude vā peśyāṃ vā mātuḥkukṣau vālabdhaṃ cakṣurlabdhaṃ vā naṣṭam
T06asabhs_u:383: nirupādhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātusamāpannasya ārūpyeṣūpapannasyāryasya vā // yathā cakṣuśya cakṣurdhātuśca tathā śrotraghrāṇajivhākāya dhātavo yathāyogyaṃ veditavyāḥ // kiṃ syānmano 'pi
T06asabhs_u:394: tadbhūmāvutpannaḥ kiṃ tadbhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyati /
T06asabhs_u:395: tadbhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyati, anyabhūmikenāpi /
T06asabhs_u:396: kāmadhātāvapapannaḥ māvacareṇa cakṣuṣā kāmāvacarāṇi rūpāṇi paśyati /
T06asabhs_u:398: yathā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi pratigṛṇhāti tatha śrotreṇa śabdaṃ pratigṛṇhāti /
T06asabhs_u:399: yathā kāmadhātāvutpannastathā rūpadhātāvutpannaḥ kāmāvacareṇa ghrāṇena jivhayā kāyena cā kāmāvacarān gandhān jighrati rasānāsvādane sparśān budhyati ca // rūpadhātāvutpanno rūpāvacareṇa kāyena svabhūmikān sparśān budhyati /
T06asabhs_u:403: kāmadhātāvutpannaḥ kāmāvacareṇa manasā traidhātukānanāsravāṃśca dharmāna vijānāti // yadhā kāmadhātāvutpannastathā rūpadhātāvutpannaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:404: ārūpyadhātāvutpanna ārūpyāvacareṇa manasā ārūpyāvacarān svabhūmikānanāsravāṃśca dharmān vijānāti
T06asabhs_u:412: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:415: vedanānimittagrahaṇābhisaṃskāreṇa saṃkleśavyavadānābhyāṃ ca saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ca /
T06asabhs_u:423: vyatisārya snāpitaṃ gandhaṃ mālyaṃ ca paricarati /
T06asabhs_u:427: aparato manodhātorapi teṣu teṣu vikalpaḥ // evaṃ ca adhyātmadhātoranukrameṇa bahirdhādhātorvyavasthānam
T06asabhs_u:428: tadanukrameṇa vijñānadhātorvyavasthānam // yathā dhātūnāmanukrama āyatanānāmapi tadvat
T06asabhs_u:431: atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamadhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre yadvāntike tatsarvamabhisaṃkṣipyocyate rūpaskandhaḥ rāśyarthamupādaya /
T06asabhs_u:433: evaṃ yāvat vijñānaskandham // āpica duḥkhavaipulya lakṣaṇatāmupādāya skandha ucyate /
T06asabhs_u:446: yathā buddhena bhāṣitam rūpaṃ budbudopamaṃ vedanā phenopamā saṃjñā marīcikopamā saṃskārāḥ parṇo pamā vijñānaṃ māyopamamiti /
T06asabhs_u:447: kimarthaṃ rūpaṃ budbudopamaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ māyopamamiti /
T06asabhs_u:453: dravyamanto jñeyarūpāṇyāsravotpannakādi ca atītāḥ pratyayāścaiva kathaṃ kati kimarthibhiḥ
T06asabhs_u:454: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu kathaṃ dravyamat kati dvayamanti kimarthaṃ dravyamatparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:474: kathaṃ jñeyaṃ kati jñeyāni kimarthaṃ jñeyaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:476: rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā dharmāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:477: yatra saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ vayat saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate vā yaśca saṃkleśayati vyavadāyayati vā yā ca tatrāvasthā yā ca vyavadānatā tadāśrayeṇa sarvaṃ jñeyam // tatra rūpaṃ rūpaskandho daśarūpadhātavo daśa rūpāyatanāni
T06asabhs_u:478: dharmadhātvāyatanasaṃgṛhītāni ca rūpāṇi // cittaṃ vijñānaskandhaḥ saptavijñānadhātavo manaāyatanaṃ ca // caitasikā dharmā vedanāskandhaḥ
T06asabhs_u:480: cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ citta viprayuktaḥ saṃskāraskandho dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca // asaṃskṛtaṃ dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:481: api khalu jñeyā dharmāḥ adhimuktijñānagocarato 'pi yuktijñānagocarato 'pi
T06asabhs_u:486: jānakapaśyakātmābhiniveśatmājanārtham // (Abhidh-s 17) kathaṃ vijñeyaṃ kati vijñeyāni kimarthaṃ vijñeyaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:496: kathaṃ rūpi kati rūpīṇi kimarthaṃ rūpiparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:507: arūpyātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ sanidarśanaṃ kati sanidarśanāni kimarthaṃ sanidarśanaparīkṣā
T06asabhs_u:516: kathaṃ sapratighaṃ kati sapratighāni kimarthaṃ sapratigha parīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:518: api khalu tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sapratighaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:530: kathaṃ sāsravaṃ kati sāsravāṇi kimarthaṃ sāsravaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:534: pañcopādānaskandhāḥ sāsravāḥ pañcadaśa dhātavo daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:539: kathaṃ saraṇaṃ kati saraṇāni kimarthaṃ saraṇaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:547: raṇaviprayuktātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ sāmiṣaṃ kati sāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ sāmiṣaparīkṣā
T06asabhs_u:552: āmiṣayuktātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kati nirāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ nirāmiṣaparīkṣā
T06asabhs_u:555: āmiṣaviyuktātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ gredhāśritaṃ kati gredhā śritāni kimarthaṃ gredhāśritaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:561: kathaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ kati naiṣkramyāśritāni kimarthaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:564: gredhaviyuktātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kati saṃskṛtāni kimarthaṃ saṃskṛtaparīkṣā yasyotpā do 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi
T06asabhs_u:576: kāmakārasaṃmukhī vimukhībhāvatāmupādāya nāsaṃskṛtam // yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti [?] // tatkathaṃ yenārthena saṃskṛtaṃ na tenārthenāsaṃskṛtam /
T06asabhs_u:577: yenāsaṃskṛtaṃ na tenārthena saṃskṛtamityatra nayo draṣṭavyaḥ // kathaṃ laukikaṃ kati laukikāni kimarthaṃ laukikaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:578: traidhātukaparyāpannaṃ laukikaṃ lokottara pṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ ca tatpratibhāsam /
T06asabhs_u:579: skandhānāmekadeśaḥ pañcadaśa dhātavaḥ daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ
T06asabhs_u:580: ātmani lokābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ lokottaraṃ kati lokottarāṇi kimarthaṃ lokottaraparīkṣā
T06asabhs_u:583: api khalu paryāyeṇa loko ttarapṛṣṭalabdhaṃ lokottaram /
T06asabhs_u:591: ādyutpannaṃ prabandhotpannam upacayotpannam āśrayotpannaṃ vikārotpannaṃ paripākotpannaṃ hānyutpannaṃ viśeṣotpannaṃ prabhāsvarotpannam aprabhāsvarotpannaṃ saṃkrāntyutpannaṃ savījotpannam avījotpannaṃ pratibimbavibhutvanidarśanotpannaṃ paraṃparotpannaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgotpannaṃ saṃyogaviyogotpannam avasthāntarotpannaṃ cyutopapādotpannaṃ saṃvarttavivarttotpannaṃ pūrvakālotpannaṃ maraṇakālo tpannam antarotpannaṃ pratisandhikālotpannaṃ
T06asabhs_u:596: kathaṃ grāhakaṃ kati grāhakāṇi kimarthaṃ grāhakaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:598: trayaḥ skandhā rūpasaṃskāraskandhaikadeśaḥ dvādaśa dhātavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca
T06asabhs_u:599: bhoktātmā bhiniveśalājanārtham // api khalu aprāptagrāhakaṃ prāptagrāhakaṃ svalakṣaṇavarttamānapratyeka grāhakaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇasarvakālaṃ sarvaviṣayagrāhakaṃ ca grāhakaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:601: prajñaptikaśca grāhakavādo draṣṭavyaḥ // kathaṃ grāhyaṃ kati grāhyāni kimarthaṃ grāhyaparīkṣā
T06asabhs_u:604: sarvāṇi (grāhyāṇi) viṣayātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ vahirmukhaṃ kati bahirmukhāni kimarthaṃ bahirmukha parīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:605: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ bahirmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā buddhaśāsane śrutamayacintāmayatadanudharmaparigṛhītāṃ ścittacaitasikān dharmān /
T06asabhs_u:606: ca tvāro dhātavaḥ dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ caikadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:610: catuto dhātūn sthāpayitvā dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:614: nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ punaḥ sarvatragamanaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ kleśo rūpārūpya
T06asabhs_u:620: aṣṭau dhātavaḥ aṣṭāyatanāni skandhānāṃ śeṣāṇāṃ ca dhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:623: utpannaniruddha lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalopayo gato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānakāritra samatikrāntito
T06asabhs_u:627: hetau satya nutpannato 'pi alabdhasva lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalānupayogato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānabhāvā pratyupasthānato 'pi
T06asabhs_u:632: kathaṃ pratyutpannaṃ kati pratyutpannāni kimarthaṃ pratyutpannaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:633: utpannāniruddha lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalopayogānupayogato 'pi saṃkleśa vyavadānapratyupasthānato 'pi atītānāgata bhāva nimittato 'pi
T06asabhs_u:636: pravarttakātmābhiniveśatyājanārthameva // atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ punaḥ kathāvastu na nirvāṇam /
T06asabhs_u:637: pratyātmavedanīyatayā nirabhilapyatāmupādāya bhutabhavyavarttamānaparihā rādhiṣṭhānatāṃ copādaya // kathaṃ (Abhidh-s
T06asabhs_u:643: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātunāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatānānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:645: śraddhādaya ekādaśa caitasikā dharmāḥ // sambandhataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:647: teṣāmeva yā vāsanā // utthanataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:648: tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyakarmma vākkarmma // paramārthataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:650: eṣāmeva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pūrvābhyāsamāgamyaṃ tadrūpā vipākābhinirvṛtiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:651: yathā teṣveva prakṛtyā apratisaṃkhyāya rūciḥ saṃtiṣṭhate // prayogataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:652: satpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamya saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāraṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiṃ kuśalasya bhāvanā // puskārataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:653: yattathāgataṃ vā puraskṛtya caitye vā pustagate vā citragate dharmaṃ vā puraskṛtya dharmādhiṣṭhāni pustake pūjākarma // anugrahataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:654: yaccaturbhi saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvānanugṛṇhataḥ // parigrahataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:655: yaddānamayena puṇyakriyāvastunā vā śīlamayena vā svargopapattiparigraho vā āḍhyo kulopapattiparigraho vā vyavadānānukūlyaparigraho vā pratipakṣataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:656: yo vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣa dūrobhāva pratipakṣaḥ viṣkambhaṇāpratipakṣaḥ visaṃyogapratipakṣaḥ kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ // upaśamataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:657: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaḥ sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhāturapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ ca // niṣyandataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:658: upaśamaprāptasya tadādhipatyena vaiśeṣikā guṇā abhijñādayo laukikalokottarāḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāḥ // kathamakuśalaṃ katyakuśalāni kimarthamakuśalaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:663: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātunāṃ caturṇṇāmāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ // adharmayuktātmābhini veśatyājanārtham
T06asabhs_u:665: manaḥsaṃprayuktaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kleśaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ klaśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpakaḥ // sambandhato
T06asabhs_u:673: yathāpi tadakuśalā bhyāsa stūdapo vipāko 'bhinivarttate yenākuśala eva rūciḥ santiṣṭhate //
T06asabhs_u:675: yathāpi tadasatpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamyasaddharmaśravaṇamayoni śomanaskāraṃ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścarītaṃ carati // puraskārato 'kuśalaṃ
T06asabhs_u:677: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsāpūrvakaṃ vā kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ vā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati tatra vā pūjākarma prayojayati yatra mahān janakāyo 'puṇyena yujyate upaghātato
T06asabhs_u:679: yathāpi tatsattveṣu kāyena vācā manasā mithyā pratipadyate // parigrahato 'kuśalaṃ katamat
T06asabhs_u:680: yathā tatkāyena duścaritaṃ caritvā vācā manasā duścaritaṃ caritvā durgatau vā sugatau vā aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ gṛṇhātyakṣepakaṃ vā paripūrakaṃ vā // vipakṣato 'kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:681: ye pratipakṣavipakṣā dharmāḥ // pari panthato 'kuśalaṃ katamat ye kuśalāntarāyikā dharmāḥ // kathamavyākṛtaṃ katyavyākṛtāni kimarthamavyākṛtaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:689: aṣṭau rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni sasaṃprayogaṃ manojīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgo nāma kāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāśca // sambandhato 'vyākṛtaṃ
T06asabhs_u:691: aduṣṭāprasannacittasya taireva nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ cittacaitasikā (Abhidh-s 24) dharmāḥ // anubandhato 'vyākṛtaṃ
T06asabhs_u:700: prayogato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat akliṣṭākuśalacetasa airyāpathikaṃ śailpasthānikaṃ ca // puraskārato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:701: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsākudṛṣṭi vivarjitaṃ caityaṃ vā pratiṣṭhāpayati pūjākarma vā prayojayati yatra mahājanakāyo na puṇyaṃ prasavati nāpuṇyam // anugrahato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat
T06asabhs_u:702: / yathāpi taddāsabhṛtakakarmakareṣu putradāreṣu vā aduṣṭāprasannacitto dānaṃ dadāti // upabhogato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:705: mātmabhāvaparigrahaṃ karoti yena laghu ladhveva teṣu śilpasthāneṣu śikṣāniṣṭhāṃ gacchati // pratipakṣato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:706: yathāpi tat pratisaṃkhyāya bhaiṣajyaṃ niṣevate // upaśamato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:710: yadbuddhāḥ paramapāramiprāptāśca bodhisattvā nidarśayanti sattvānāmanugrahārthaṃ na tu teṣāṃ tatra tathā kācit pariniṣpattiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:711: kathaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kati kā(ma)pratisaṃyuktāni kimarthaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:713: catvāro dhātavo dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:716: kāmavītarāgasya rūpāvītarāgasya kuśalāvyakṛtaṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktaṃ draṣṭavyam // caturo dhātūna dve cāyatane sthāpayitā tadanyeṣāṃ
T06asabhs_u:722: rūpavītarāgātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // vairāgyaṃ punarekadeśavairāgyaṃ skalavairāgyaṃ prativedhavairāgyamupaghātavairāgyaṃ samudghātavairāgyaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:724: prakṛtivairāgyamupaghātavairāgyamupastambhavairāgyaṃ samutkarṣavairāgyaṃ sammohavairāgyaṃ pratipakṣavairāgyaṃ parijñāvairāgyaṃ prahāṇi vairāgyaṃ sottaravairāgyaṃ niruttaravairāgyam // prakṛtivairāgyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:725: duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dhamaṣu yā pratikulatā //
T06asabhs_u:729: subhuktavato mṛṣṭe 'pi bhojane yā pratikūlatā // samutkarṣavairāgyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:730: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptava to nirhīne sthāne yā pratikūlatā // sammohavairāgyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:731: bālānāṃ nirvāṇe yā pratikūlatā // pratipakṣa vairāgyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:732: laukikena vā lokottareṇa vā mārgeṇa yatkleśaprahāṇam // parijñāvairāgyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:733: pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuke yā pratikūlatā // prahāṇivairāgyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:734: bhūmau bhūmau kleśān prajahato yā pratikūlatā //
T06asabhs_u:736: laukikānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca yadvairāgyam // niruttaraṃ vairāgyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:737: yad buddhabodhisattvānāṃ vairāgyaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhādhiṣṭhānatā mupādāya // kathaṃ śaikṣaṃ
T06asabhs_u:743: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:746: pṛthagjanasya kuśalākuśalāvyakṛtaṃ śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamaśaikṣasya cāvyākṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:747: aṣṭau dhātavo 'ṣṭā vāyatanāni tadanyeṣāṃ (Abhidh-s 26) skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ
T06asabhs_u:750: parikalpitā kliṣṭā dṛṣṭiḥ vicikitsādṛṣṭisthānaṃ ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ yacca dṛṣṭyā samutthāpitaṃ kāyavā kkarma sarvaṃ cāpāyikaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:759: skaṃdhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:773: dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopadānaṃ bhavo jāti rjarāmaraṇaṃ ca // kathamaṅgasamāsato 'pi /
T06asabhs_u:776: avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ ca // ākṣiptakāṅgaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:777: nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca // abhinrivarttakāṅgaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:786: bhave ca sattvān saṃmohayati pratyayaśca (Abhidh-s 27) bhavati saṃskārāṇām // saṃskārāḥ kiṃkarmakāḥ
T06asabhs_u:787: gatiṣu ca sattvān vibhajanti pratyayāśca bhavanti vijñānavāsanāyāḥ // vijñānaṃ kiṃ karmakam
T06asabhs_u:788: sattvānāṃ karmabandhaṃ ca dhārayati pratyayaśca bhavati nāmarūpasya // nāmarūpaṃ ca kiṃkarmakam
T06asabhs_u:789: ātmabhāvaṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratyayaśca bhavati ṣaḍāyatanasya //
T06asabhs_u:790: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kiṃkarmakam // ātmabhāvaparipūriṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratya yaśca bhavati sparśasya // sparśaḥ kiṃkarmakaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:791: viṣayopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati vedanāyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:793: janmopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati tṛṣṇāyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:795: janmani ca sattvānākarṣayati pratyayaśca bhavati upādānasya // upādānaṃ kiṃkarmakam /
T06asabhs_u:796: punarbhavādānārthaṃ sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti pratyayaśca bhavati bhavasya // bhavaḥ kiṃkarmakaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:797: punarbhave ca sattvānabhimukhīkaroti pratyayaśca bhavati jāteḥ // jātiḥ kiṃkarmikā /
T06asabhs_u:798: nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanānupūrvyā ca sattvānabhinirvarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya // jarāmaraṇaṃ kiṃkarmakam /
T06asabhs_u:799: punaḥ punarvayaḥpariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvānyojayati // kathamaṅgasaṃkle śasaṃgrahataḥ
T06asabhs_u:800: yā cāvidyā yā ca tṛṣṇā yaccopādānamityayaṃ saṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:801: ye ca saṃskārā yacca vijñānaṃ yaśca bhava ityayaṃ karmasaṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:804: sahetukārthaḥ niḥsattvārthaḥ parataṃtrārthaḥ nirohakārthaḥ anityārthaḥ kṣaṇikārthaḥ hetuphalaprabandhānupacchedārthaḥ anurūpahetuphalārthaḥ vicitrahetuphalārthaḥ pratiniyatahetuphalārthaśca pratītyasamutpādārthaḥ
T06asabhs_u:808: gāmbhīryaṃ draṣṭavyam // api khalu kṣaṇikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ sthititaścopalabhyate /
T06asabhs_u:811: na svato na parato na dvābhyāṃ na
T06asabhs_u:815: vijñānotpattiprabhedataḥ cyutyupapattiprabhedataḥ vāhyaśasyotpattiprabhedataḥ saṃvarttavivarttaprabhe dattaḥ āhāropastambhaprabhedataḥ iṣṭāniṣṭagativibhāgaprabhedataḥ viśuddhiprabhedataḥ prabhāvaprabhedataśca prabhedo draṣṭavyaḥ // kathamanulomapratilomataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:819: kathaṃ pratyayaḥ kati pratyayāḥ kimarthaṃ pratyayaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:824: ālayavijñānaṃ kuśalavāsanā ca // api khalu svabhāvato 'pi
T06asabhs_u:828: utpattikāraṇaṃ tadyathā cakṣuḥ sāmagrī vijñānasya // sthitikāraṇaṃ tadyathā āhāro bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ ca // dhṛtikāraṇaṃ tadyathā pṛthivī sattvānām //
T06asabhs_u:829: prakāśakāraṇaṃ tadyathā pradīpo rūpāṇām // vikārakāraṇaṃ tadyathā agnirindhanasya // viyogakāraṇaṃ tadyathā dātraṃ chedyasya //
T06asabhs_u:832: saṃpratyāyanakāraṇaṃ tadyathā pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntāḥ sādhyasya // prāpaṇakāraṇaṃ tadyathā mārgo
T06asabhs_u:833: nirvāṇasya // vyavahārakāraṇaṃ tadyathā nāma saṃjñā dṛṣṭiśca //
T06asabhs_u:835: tadyathā jighatsāmapekṣya bhojane // ākṣepakāraṇaṃ vidūraḥ pratyayaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:837: tadyathā avidyā saṃskārāṇām // parigrahakāraṇaṃ tadanyaḥ pratyayaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:838: tadyathā kṣetrodakapāsyā (? vāpyā)dikaṃ sasyodayasya // āvāhakakāraṇamanukūlataḥ pratyayaḥ
T06asabhs_u:839: tadyathā samyagrājāsevā rājārādhanāyāḥ // prati niyamakāraṇaṃ pratyayavaicitryam /
T06asabhs_u:842: tadyathā vijñānasya indriyamaparibhinnaṃ viṣaya ābhāsagataḥ tajjaśca manaskāraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ // (Abhidh-s 29)
T06asabhs_u:851: pūrvabhāvitānāṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭatarā puṣṭatamā pravṛttiḥ // kathaṃ paripanthataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:860: avastukaviṣayālambanato 'pi vastvālambanato 'pi parikalpālambanatāpi viparyastālambanato 'pi aviparyastālambatopi savyāghātālambanato 'pi
T06asabhs_u:866: kathaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaṃ kati sabhāgatatsabhāgāni kimarthaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:869: rūpaskandhaikadeśaḥ pañcarūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni vijñānayuktāyuktātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathamupāttaṃ katyupāttāni kimarthamupāttaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:871: rūpaskandhaikadeśaḥ pañca rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni - caturṇāṃ caikadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:877: vedanāskandho vijñānaskandha rūpasaṃskāraskandhaikadeśaḥ dvādaśa dhātavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca
T06asabhs_u:878: ātmādhipatyabhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā kati duḥkhaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:882: duḥkhitātmābhiniveśatyāja nārtham // kathaṃ viparīṇāmaduḥkhatā kati viparīṇāmaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:886: sukhitātmābhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatā kati saṃskāraduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ
T06asabhs_u:889: skandhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayorekadeśaṃ sthāpayitvā sarvāṇi
T06asabhs_u:890: / aduḥkhāsukhātmabhiniveśatyājanārtham // kathaṃ savipākaṃ kati savipākāni kimarthaṃ savipākaparīkṣā
T06asabhs_u:897: pāriṇāmikaḥ viṣayato 'pi vaiṣayikaḥ āśayato 'pyāśi (? śayi)kaḥ upādānato
T06asabhs_u:900: āhārasthitikātmabhiniveśatyajanārtham // api khalvāhāro 'śuddhā śrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ sthitisāṃdarśinakaśca draṣṭavyaḥ // kathaṃ sottaraṃ (Abhidh-s 31) kati sottarāṇi kimarthaṃ sottaraparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:911: parikalpitalakṣaṇaprabhedaḥ vikalpitalakṣaṇaprabhedaḥ dharmatālakṣaṇaprabhedaśca // tatra parikalpitalakṣaṇaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:912: skandhadhātvāyataneṣvātmeti vā sattvo jīvo jantuḥ poṣo pugdalo manujo mānava iti vā yatparikalpyate // vikalpitalakṣaṇaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:916: lakṣaṇaprabhedaḥ prakāraprabhevā ākṣayaprabhedaḥ santatiprabhedaśca // lakṣaṇaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ
T06asabhs_u:918: teṣāmevaskandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ dravyamantaḥ prajñaptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamantaḥ rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādi
T06asabhs_u:920: yāvantaḥ sattvāśrayā stāvanti skandhadhātvāyatanāni // santatiprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:921: pratikṣaṇaṃ skandhadhātvāyatānānāṃ pravṛttiḥ // lakṣaṇaprabhede kuśalaḥ kiṃ parijānāti
T06asabhs_u:922: / ātmābhiniveśaṃ parijānāti // prakāraprabhede kuśalaḥ kiṃ parijānāti /
T06asabhs_u:923: piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ parijānāti // āśrayaprabhede kuśalaḥ kiṃ parijānāti /
T06asabhs_u:924: akṛtābhyāgamakṛtavipraṇāśasaṃjñāṃ parijānāti // santatiprabhede kuśalaḥ kiṃ parijāti /
T06asabhs_u:926: api khalu ṣaḍvidhaḥ prabhedaḥ eṣāmeva skandhadhātvāyatananām /
T06asabhs_u:927: bahirmukhaprabhedaḥ antarmukhaprabhedaḥ āyata kālabhedaḥ paricchinnakālaprabhedaḥ tatkālaprabhedaḥ saṃdarśanaprabhedaśca /
T06asabhs_u:933: śaikṣāṇāṃ sthāpayitvā caramakṣaṇe skandhadhātvāyatanāni (Abhidh-s 32) tadanyāni aśaikṣāṇām // tatkālaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:935: buddhānāṃ pāramiprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca sanidarśanāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni (atha mahāyānābhidharmasamuccayaśāstre mūlavastuni saṃgrahaparicchedo
T06asabhs_u:939: lakṣaṇasaṃgrahaḥ dhātusaṃgrahaḥ jātisaṃgrahaḥ avasthāsaṃgrahaḥ sahāyasaṃgrahaḥ deśasaṃgrahaḥ kālasaṃgrahaḥ ekadeśasaṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgrahaḥ itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ paramārthasaṃgrahaśca // lakṣaṇasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:949: evaṃ tadanye skandhā dhātava āyatanāni ca /
T06asabhs_u:952: evaṃ tadanyadiśāmapi skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ veditavyam // kālasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:956: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśa saṃgraho veditavyaḥ // sakalasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:957: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ // itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ rūpaskandhasaṃgrahe kati dhātavaḥ katyāyatanāni daśānāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:960: yathā vedanāskandhastathāsaṃjñāsaṃskāra skandhau // vijñānaskandhasaṃgrahe kati dhātavaḥ katyāyatanāni
T06asabhs_u:961: sapta dhātava ekamāyatanam // cakṣurdhātusaṃgrahe kati skandhaḥ katyāyatanāni /
T06asabhs_u:966: trayaḥ skandhā rūpaskandhaikadeśa ekamāyatanam // cakṣurvijñānadhātusaṃgrahe kati skandhāḥ katyāyatanāni vijñānaskandhāmanaāyatanayorekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:974: trayāṇāṃ skandhānā mekadeśa eko dhātuśca // tadvat tadanye dharmāḥ
T06asabhs_u:976: yathā dravyamantaḥ prajñāptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamanto jñeyā vijñeyā abhijñeyā rūpiṇo
T06asabhs_u:981: yathā yathā ālambaneṣu cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ tathā tathā kuśalamūlābhivṛddhiḥ // 0 //
T06asabhs_u:985: avinirbhāga saṃprayogaḥ miśrībhāva saṃprayogaḥ samavadhānasaṃprayogaḥ sahabhāvasaṃprayogaḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānasaṃprayogaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaśca
T06asabhs_u:987: sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ paramāṇuparyāpannānāṃ rūpāṃśikānāmanyonyamavinirbhāgaḥ // miśrībhāvasaṃprayogaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:988: (Abhidh-s 34) paramāṇorūrdhvaṃ sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ rūpāṃśikānāṃ parasparaṃ miśrībhāvaḥ // samavadhānasaṃprayogaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:989: deśināmeva samudāyināṃ rūpaparaṃparāyāṃ samavadhānam // sahabhāvasaṃprayogaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:990: ekasmin kāye skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sahakālapravṛttiḥ samamutpatti sthitinirodhāḥ
T06asabhs_u:1001: sarvatragasaṃprayogastadyathā vedanā saṃjñācetanāsparśamanaskāra vijñānānām // api khalu kliṣṭasarvatragaḥ saṃprayogo manasi caturṇṇāṃ
T06asabhs_u:1002: kleśānām // kādācitkaḥ saṃprayogastadyathā citte śraddhādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ ca kleśopakleśānām // āvasthikaḥ saṃprayogaḥ sukhāyā vedanāyāḥ sasaṃprayogāyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1003: evaṃ duḥkhāyā aduḥkhāsukhāyāḥ // avicchinnaḥ saṃprayogaḥ sacittikāyāmavasthāyām /
T06asabhs_u:1004: vicchinnaḥ saṃprayogo 'cittakasamāpattyantaritasya // bahirmukhaḥ saṃprayogo yadbhūyasā kāma pratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittacaitasikānām // antarmukhaḥ saṃprayogaḥ yadbhūyasā
T06asabhs_u:1005: samāhitabhūmikānāṃ cittacaitasikānām // ucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ pārthagjanikānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇām //
T06asabhs_u:1006: anucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ lokottarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāmādyataduttarāṇāṃ lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhānāṃ ca // saṃprayogakuśalaḥ kamanuśaṃsaṃ pratilabhate
T06asabhs_u:1007: / cittamātre vedanādīnāṃ sāṃkleśikānāṃvyāvadānikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ saṃprayogaṃ jānāti /
T06asabhs_u:1008: tacca jānanātmā vedayate saṃjānāti cetayate smarati saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate cetayatya bhiniveśaṃ prajahāti nairātmyamavatarati
T06asabhs_u:1015: kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaiśca kleśopakleśairvījasamancāgamena samancāgataḥ upapattiprātilābhikaiśca // kuśalaiḥ // rūpadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ klaiśopakleśaiḥ vījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1018: upapatti(prāti)lābhikaiśca kuśalaiḥ // traidhātu kapratipakṣa lābhī yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpannastasya bījasamanvāgamenāsamanvāgataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1021: prayogikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vaśitāsamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ vā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyādīnāṃ tadekatyājāṃ(cā) vyākṛtānām //
T06asabhs_u:1023: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ yo ya eva dharmaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kuśalo vā akuśalo vā avyākṛto vā tasya samudācārasamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ // samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1028: tathā ācayāpacayajño na kasyāṃ cillaukikyāṃ saṃpattau vipattau vā ekāntikasaṃjñī bhavati yāvadevānunayapratighaprahāṇāya
T06asabhs_u:1039: narakasattvajanmatiryakpreteṣu manuṣyeṣu pūrvavideheṣvapagodānīyeṣu jāmbūdvīpeṣu uttareṣu kuruṣu deveṣu
T06asabhs_u:1040: caturmā(hā)rājakāyikeṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu brahmapurohiteṣu mahābrāhmeṣuparīttābheṣva
T06asabhs_u:1042: śubhakṛtsneṣvanabhrakeṣu puṇyaprasaveṣu vṛhatphaleṣva saṃjñisattveṣvabṛheṣvatapeṣu sudṛśeṣu sudarśaneṣvakaniṣṭheṣvākāśānantyāyataneṣu vijñānānantyāyataneṣvākiñcanyāyataneṣu naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu janmādhiṣṭhānaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1046: pṛthivīmaṇḍale sumeruḥ saptakāñcanaparvatāḥ catvāro dvīpāḥ aṣṭāvantaradvīpāḥ abhyantaraḥ samudro vāhyasamudraścatasraḥ sumerupariṣaṇḍāḥ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ vāpastriṃśānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi cakracāḍaḥ parvataḥ ākāśe vimānāni yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca asurāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi nārakāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi /
T06asabhs_u:1047: uṣṇanarakāḥśītanarakāḥ pratyekanarakāśca tadekatyānāṃ ca tiryakpretānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi yāvadādityāḥ paricaranto diśo 'vabhāsayante vairocanāstāvatsāhasrake loke sahasraṃ candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryaṇāṃ sahasraṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājāṇāṃ sahasraṃ caturṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ sahasraṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sahasraṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sahasraṃ yāmānāṃ sahasraṃ tuṣitānāṃ sahasraṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ sahasraṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ sahasraṃ brahmalaukikānāmidamucyate sahasracūḍiko lokadhātuḥ // sahasraṃ sahasracūḍikānāṃ dhātūnāmucyate dvitīyo (Abhidh-s 37) madhyamasāhasro lokadhātuḥ // sahasraṃ madhyamasāhasradhātūnāmucyate tṛtīyo mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1048: evaṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ mahācakravāḍa parvatamaṇḍala pariveṣṭitaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1050: tathā ca devaḥ cakrākārān vṛṣṭivindūn nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mākāśād varṣati /
T06asabhs_u:1051: tathā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mapramāṇo lokadhātuḥ saṃvarttiṣyate vā vivarttiṣyate vā saṃvarttate vā saṃvṛttastiṣṭhati vā vivarttate vā vivṛttastiṣṭhati vā /
T06asabhs_u:1052: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathā sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu /
T06asabhs_u:1053: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśaḥ janitaḥ karmakleśādhipateyaśca sarvamucyate duḥkhasatyam /
T06asabhs_u:1054: pariśuddhalokadhātustu na duḥkhasatyasaṃgṛhīḥto na karmakleśa janitaḥ na karmakleśādhipateyaśca
T06asabhs_u:1055: kevalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānena vyavadānakuśalamūlādhipatinā ākṛṣyate tadutpattisthānaṃ cācintyaṃ kevalaṃ buddhena budhyate na dhyāyināṃ dhyānagocaraḥ kiṃ punaḥ cintayatām //
T06asabhs_u:1057: "jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviprayogo
T06asabhs_u:1058: duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham" // jātiḥ kimupādāya duḥkham /
T06asabhs_u:1071: saṃvādhaduḥkhaṃ vipariṇati duḥkhaṃ saṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ viprayogaduḥkhaṃ kāmyaphalābhāvaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhaṃ ca // evaṃ ṣaḍ bāhulyenāṣṭau
T06asabhs_u:1073: (Abhidh-s 38) ṣaḍ samānānyaṣṭau bhavanti // yaduktaṃ tisro duḥkhatāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1075: tatra kathaṃ tisṛṣu saṃgṛhītānyaṣṭau aṣṭasu vā saṃgṛhītāstisraḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1077: jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhamiti santānaduḥkhaduḥkhatā
T06asabhs_u:1078: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ tadvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
T06asabhs_u:1079: saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhaṃ tat saṃskāraduḥkhatā // yaduktaṃ dvividhe duḥkhe iti /
T06asabhs_u:1080: tat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ paramārthasatyena duḥkhaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:1081: katamat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ katamat paramārthasatyena duḥkham /
T06asabhs_u:1082: jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvat yadapīcchann labhate tadapi duḥkhamiti saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkham /
T06asabhs_u:1083: yaduktaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paramārthasatyena duḥkham //
T06asabhs_u:1085: anityalakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyalakṣaṇamanātmalakṣaṇaṃ ca // anityalakṣaṇaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1087: asallakṣaṇaṃ vināśalakṣaṇaṃ vipariṇatilakṣaṇaṃ viyogalakṣaṇaṃ sannihitalakṣaṇaṃdharmatālakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prabandhalakṣaṇaṃ vyādhyādi lakṣaṇaṃ cittacittākāravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ bhogasaṃpattirvipatti lakṣaṇaṃ bhājanalokasaṃvarttavivarttalakṣaṇam //
T06asabhs_u:1089: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu sarvakāli kātmātmīyatā nityābhāvaḥ // vināśalakṣaṇaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1101: anādimati saṃskāre utpannaniruddhā nāṃ prabandhāprahāṇam // vyadhyādi lakṣaṇa katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1105: kadācit sārāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati kadācid vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1106: yadvat sadveṣaṃ vā vītadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā vihisāṃ vā nimnaṃ vā unnataṃ vā uddhataṃ vā anuddhataṃ vā upaśāntaṃ vā anupaśāntaṃ vā samāhita vā asamāhitaṃ vā /
T06asabhs_u:1111: tisṛṇāṃ saṃvarttarnānāṃ śīrṣāṇi dvitīya tṛtīya caturthadhyānāni /
T06asabhs_u:1112: caturthadhyāne vāhyānāṃ vimānānāṃ tu vāhyābhāvat eva saṃvarttavivarttaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1113: kevalaṃ tairdevaiḥ tāni vimānāni saha nirvarttante saha nirudhyante etaducyate saṃvartta vivarttaḥ // api khalu trayo 'ntarakalpāḥ
T06asabhs_u:1126: tayā kalpasaṃkhyāyā rūpārūpyācarāṇāṃ devānāmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ varṇyate // yaduktam anyatare, sattvā āyuḥkṣayād vā puṇya kṣayād vā karmakṣayād vā tasmādadhiṣṭhānāt cyavante iti /
T06asabhs_u:1136: tisro duḥkhatāḥ aṣṭākā vā duḥkhaṃ ṣaḍākāraṃ vā
T06asabhs_u:1137: (Abhidh-s 40) duḥkhaṃ bāhulyena pūrvamuktaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ nāma /
T06asabhs_u:1138: kiṃ pratītyasūtre uktaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
T06asabhs_u:1142: ubhayāṃśīkimanityatāṃ pratītya saṃskāraduḥkhatā prajñāyate // tathā ca saṃskārānityatāṃ
T06asabhs_u:1143: saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mayā yatkiṃcid veditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti // api khalu utpādavyayadharmadvayānugateṣu
T06asabhs_u:1145: prajñāyante ityabhisaṃdhāya buddhena bhāṣitaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
T06asabhs_u:1146: api ca anityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ prajñāyate iti anityato duḥkhaṃ na sarve saṃskārā ityatrādhisandhirveditavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1159: tacca ātmano nāstitā anātmano 'stitā satī śūnyatā //
T06asabhs_u:1161: asato yathābhūtajñānamabhāvaḥ // api khalu trividhā śūnyatā /
T06asabhs_u:1168: idamucyate anātmalakṣaṇam // etadabhisaṃghāyoktaṃ bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti
T06asabhs_u:1169: // api coktaṃ bhagavatā naitat sarvaṃ mama naiṣo 'hamasmi na me sa ātmā iti /
T06asabhs_u:1170: evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajñāya draṣṭhavyam iti tasya ko 'rtha
T06asabhs_u:1180: yathā cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatā tathā rūpādīnāmapi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā /
T06asabhs_u:1181: cittopāttatāmupādāya cittaikayogakṣematāmupādāya cittavikāratadvikāratāmupādāya cittāśrayatāmudāpādāya cittādhipatyasaṃbhūtatāmupādāya cittvaśavarttināṃ copādāya // api khalu atyantavikāropālabdhitāmupādāya utpannasya cānapekṣya pratyayaṃ svarasavināśitāmupādāya rūpasyāpi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā //
T06asabhs_u:1182: yaduktaṃ yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvantaccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāyeti /
T06asabhs_u:1188: upādāyarūpe 'pi yadupādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāya upalabhyate tattatrāstīti veditavyam // yatpunarūcyate paramāṇusaṃcitto rūpa samudāya iti tatra niḥśarīraḥ (Abhidh-s 42)
T06asabhs_u:1190: buddhyā paryantaprabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāvibhāghanatāmupādāya rūpe dravyāḥ pariniṣpattipraveśatāṃ copādāya //
T06asabhs_u:1191: tat punaretad duḥkhamasti vipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitā saṃlikhitaṃ ca // asti madhyamasaṃlikhitam asti tanukamasaṃlikhitam asti tanuttaraṃ saṃlikhitam asti tanutamaṃ saṃlikhitam astyaduḥkhaṃ
T06asabhs_u:1202: yadaśaikṣāṇāṃ jīvitendriyapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam // katamadaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhapratibhāsaṃ mahāsaṃlekhapratyupasthānam
T06asabhs_u:1207: mūlabalādhānato (vā) paropasaṃhārato vā kuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam // paṭuka eva cittaprakāre svākuśalamulabalādhā nato vā paropasaṃhārato vā akuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam // paṭuke vā cittaprakāre apaṭuke vā tadubhayavai kalyādabhisaṃskārāsamarthasya vā avyākṛtacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam // śubhakāriṇaḥ adhaḥkāya statprathamataḥ śītībhavati //
T06asabhs_u:1221: upapattyāyatane tulāvanāmonnāmayogena cyavate pratisandhi ca vadhnāti /
T06asabhs_u:1224: saharāgeṇāntarābhavo nirudhyate kalalaṃ ca savijñānakamutpadyate // sa ca vipākastata ūrdhvamindriyābhinrivṛttiḥ yathā pratityasamutpāde catṛsṛṣvāyoniṣu /
T06asabhs_u:1233: tatha hi tṛṣṇā vastusarvatragā avasthāsarvatragā adhvasarvatragā dhātusarvatragā eṣaṇā sarvatragā prakārasarvatragā ca keśaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1236: 'pi kleśo draṣṭavyaḥ // parisaṃkhyānaṃ katamat // ṣaṭ kleśā daśa vā // ṣaṭ kleśāḥ katamat
T06asabhs_u:1237: rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā vicikitsā dṛṣṭiśca // ta eva dṛṣṭeḥ pañcākārjabhedena daśa bhavanti // lakṣaṇaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1238: yo dharma utpadyamāno 'praśāntalakṣaṇa utpadyamānena yena kāya
T06asabhs_u:1242: kleśānuśayaścāprahīṇo bhavati kleśasthānīyaśca dharma ābhāsagato bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1243: tatra ca ayoniśo manaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1247: api khalu kāmāvacaraḥ kleśaḥ sthāpayitvā avidyā dṛṣṭi vicikitsāṃ ca tadanyaḥ urdhvabhūmyanālambanaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1254: avastukālambanaḥ katamaḥ dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayuktāśca dharmāḥ // tadanyaḥ savastukālambana ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:1259: yathā rāgastathā pratigho 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ // pratigho rāgeṇa mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate // mānaḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:1265: ca na saṃprayujyate // krodhādaya upakleśā anyo 'nyaṃ na saṃprayujyante //
T06asabhs_u:1267: styānamauddhatyamāśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādaśca sarvatra kliṣṭe saṃprayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:1270: saṃyojanaṃ bandhanaṃ anuśayaḥ upakleśaḥ paryavasthānam oghaḥ yogaḥ upādānam granthaḥ nivaraṇam khilaḥ malaḥ nighaḥ śalyaḥ kiṃcanaḥ duścaritam āsravaḥ vighātaḥ paridāhaḥ raṇaḥ jvaraḥ vanasaḥ vibandhaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1271: saṃyojanāni kati kathaṃ saṃyojanaṃ kutra saṃyojanam /
T06asabhs_u:1273: anunayasaṃyojanam pratighasaṃyojanam mānasaṃyojanam avidyāsaṃyojanam dṛṣṭisaṃyojanam parāmarśasaṃyojanam vicikitsāsaṃyojanam īrṣyāsaṃyojanam mātsaryasaṃyojanaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:1281: sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu na dharmeṣu cittasya vihiṃsā /
T06asabhs_u:1293: sadṛśāt śreyānasmi śreyasā sadṛśo 'smīti vā yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1299: aprāpta uttare viśeṣā dhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1315: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāniḥsaraṇaṃ parikalpitavipratisāraṃ paryeṣane abhiniviśate
T06asabhs_u:1326: vicikitsāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu ratneṣu vicikitsate ratnatrayaṃ na samudāvarati
T06asabhs_u:1331: īrṣyāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto lābhasatkārān anunayati dharmaṃ na gurukaroti /
T06asabhs_u:1336: mātsaryasaṃyojanena saṃprayukta upacayamanunayati ta dvarjanatāṃ ca na satkaroti /
T06asabhs_u:1344: apica rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalasamudācāreṣu na vaśavarttitāṃ labhate /
T06asabhs_u:1347: kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayaḥ bhavarāgānuśayaḥ mānānuśayaḥ avidyānuśayaḥ dṛṣṭayanuśayaḥ vicikitsānuśayaśca /
T06asabhs_u:1352: mānapakṣīyaṃ doṣṭhulyam // avidyānuśayaḥ katamaḥ avidyāpakṣīyaṃ dauṣṭhulyam //
T06asabhs_u:1358: te sattvā hīnapratipakṣaṃ labhante mado mānaścotpadyate āryasatyeṣu saṃmohaśca /
T06asabhs_u:1359: mithyāmokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca saṃtorayanti buddhaśāsanadharmavinayeṣu vimatiḥ vicikitsā ca upakleśastu yakleśāste upakleśā api bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:1361: kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1363: ṣaḍrāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ krodhādikaścaitasiko dharmaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1364: api khalu rāgo dveṣo mohaśca caitasikā upakleśā ucyante /
T06asabhs_u:1365: yaiścitte upakleśo na vairāgyaṃ na viumokṣo nāvaraṇaprahāṇam /
T06asabhs_u:1367: tathā ca bhagavatoktam dīrgharātraṃ vo rāgadveṣamohā upakliśyantui vikṣipanti citraṃ saṃkliśyanti
T06asabhs_u:1370: punaḥ punaḥ udvegena cittaṃ paryayanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
T06asabhs_u:1371: tathāca śamathapragrahanimittabhāvanākāle tatsanniśraya brahmacaryā diśuddhi saṃgṛhītaśīla kāle cittaṃ paryavanahyanti //
T06asabhs_u:1395: nānāvṛtaśīlaiḥ kṛcchraṃ tapaḥ śīlavratopādānam // tadāśritā ca satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ ātmavādopādānam
T06asabhs_u:1397: ātmavādopādāne tu tīrthyā anyo 'nyaṃ na vivadanti /
T06asabhs_u:1411: kāmacchandanivaraṇam vyāpādanivaraṇam styānamiddhanivaraṇam auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam vicikitsānivaraṇaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:1413: tacca pravrajyāyāmabhiratau codanāyāṃ pratipattau śamathe pragrahe upekṣāyāṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:1417: cittasyādāntatayā akarmaṇyatayā durvimokṣatayā ca sattvaistasyāścaryāyā durbhedyatvāt khila ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:1421: tat saṃprajānabdiḥ sabrahmacāribhirgrāme vā araṇye vā tathā kurvantaṃ paśyadbhirucyate ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān karotyevaṃ kṛtyaṃ caratyevamācaritaṃ grāmakaṇṭaka āmiṣo
T06asabhs_u:1426: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya dīrghakālaṃ punaḥ punarjātimaraṇeṣu vilaśyante ityucyante nighāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1429: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā adhyeṣaṇāsamutpādena prabandhānupacchedena buddhe dharme saṃghe duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgeṣu vā vicikitsāsamutpādena vā śalyā nāma //
T06asabhs_u:1432: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya vittasaṃcayeṣu sabhayāḥ savairā bhūyo vihāravikṣepāḥ kiṃcanā nāma /
T06asabhs_u:1454: abhāve vighāte sarvadā dāridya duḥkhādibhiḥ kliṣṭā bhavantīti vighātāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1458: / tena nimittānuvyañjanābhiniveśena kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti
T06asabhs_u:1466: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa śastrādānadaṇḍādibhiḥ raṇayanti nānāvidhaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalahaṃ kurvantīti rāgādayo raṇā ucyante //
T06asabhs_u:1469: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa adharmarāgeṇa mahādahanena paridahanti viṣamalobhena mahādahanena paridahanti mithyādharmeṇa mahādahanena paridahantīti jvarā nāma //
T06asabhs_u:1472: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa jātimaraṇamūleṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃyojayanti saṃjanayanti sattvān nānāvidhakāyeṣu pañcagatisaṃsāreṣu abhinirvarttayantīti rāgādayo vanasā ityucyante //
T06asabhs_u:1475: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa kāyasāpekṣatā vittasāpekṣatā bodhyabhāvaḥ kolāhalaratiḥ parittakuśaladharmalābhe 'pi santoṣaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1479: rāgaḥ pratighaśca dvau kleśau viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipannau /
T06asabhs_u:1485: daśa kleśā duḥkhe samudaye ca vipratipannāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1487: punaḥ daśa kleśā nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1492: api khalu rāgaḥ kāmadhātau sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhi saṃprayujyate /
T06asabhs_u:1495: tadūrdhvamupekṣayā saṃprayujyate // pratigho duḥkhadaurmanasyosukhopekṣābhiḥ saṃprayujyate // mānaḥ kāmadhātau saumanasyopekṣābhiḥ saṃprayujyate /
T06asabhs_u:1498: tadūrdhvamupekṣayaiva saṃprayujyate // yathā mānastathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaśca //
T06asabhs_u:1500: rūpadhātāvārupyadhātau ca yathāveditaṃ saṃprayujyate // vicikitsā kāmadhātau dauramanasyopekṣābhyāṃ saṃprayujyate /
T06asabhs_u:1501: rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātau ca yathāveditaṃ saṃprayujyate // avidyā dvividhā /
T06asabhs_u:1505: tadūrdhvadhātau yathāveditaṃ saṃprayujyate // kathaṃ sarvakleśā upekṣayā
T06asabhs_u:1507: sarvakleśānāmaudāsīnyamāgamyāstagamanatāmupādāya // api khalu rāgaḥ kāmadhātau ṣaḍvijñānakāyikaḥ // yathā rāgastathā pratigho
T06asabhs_u:1509: ārūpyadhātau manovijñānakāyikaḥ // yathā rāgastathā avidyā // māno dṛṣṭirvicikitsā ca
T06asabhs_u:1510: sarvatra manovijñānakāyikāḥ // api khalu rāgaḥ pratigho mānaśca kāmadhātau
T06asabhs_u:1512: kāmadhātuvad rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātāvapi śiṣṭāḥ kleśāḥ sarvatra sarvavastu pravṛttikāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1522: rūpadhātau duḥkhādicaturvidhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ pratyekaṃ navakleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham
T06asabhs_u:1524: evaṃ ca darśanaprahātavyakleśanikāyā dvādaśādhikaṃ śataṃ kleśāḥ // kāmadhātau bhāvanā prahātavyāḥ ṣaṭkleśāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1525: sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antaprāhadṛṣṭiḥ rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca /
T06asabhs_u:1526: rūpadhātau bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ pañca kleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
T06asabhs_u:1539: anutpannasyānutpādata utpannasya varjanato vā pratipakṣa lābhamārgaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1542: asaṃbhinnālambanena manaskāreṇa sarvadharmā anātmāna iti paśyati /
T06asabhs_u:1550: yathā yathā dauṣṭhulyamutpadyate tathā tathā pratipakṣa utpadyate yathā yathā pratipakṣa utpadyate tathā tathā dauṣṭhulyanirodhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1557: sarvaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ nāma // punaḥ karma pañcavidham /
T06asabhs_u:1558: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyavasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1559: asmiṃstvarthe yad bhūyasā vyavasāyakarmābhipretam // cetanākarma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1560: puṇyakarma apuṇyakarma āniṃjyakarma ca // cetayitvā karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1562: tāni trīṇi kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi akuśalāni kuśalāni ca /
T06asabhs_u:1564: prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānam kāmamithyācāraḥ mṛṣāvādaḥ piśunavāk paruṣavāk saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ abhidyā vyāpādaḥ mithyādṛṣṭiśca /
T06asabhs_u:1567: prāṇātipātād viratiḥ adattādānādviratiḥ kāmamithyācārādviratiḥ mṛṣāvādādviratiḥ piśunavāco viratiḥ paruṣavāco viratiḥ saṃbhinnapralāpādviratiḥ anabhidhyā avyāpādaḥ samyagdṛṣṭiśca // apica prāṇātipātādīnāṃ yathāyogaṃ pañca lakṣaṇaprabhedāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1570: katamāni cetanākarmāṇi parājñaptisaṃcetanīyatākarma paramasaṃjñaptisaṃcetatīyatākarma avijñāyasaṃcetanīyatākarma mūlābhiniveśasacetanīyatākarma viparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1571: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatākarma viparyāsaṃcetana yatā karma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1572: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatā karmaviparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarmabhyāṃ yadi kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ ca na nāsya vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedyate /
T06asabhs_u:1578: tanna daśānāmakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ triṣu apāyeṣu /
T06asabhs_u:1580: nipyandaphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇa manuṣyeṣūpanannānā mātmabhāvaparigrahayorvipattiḥ adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vipattiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1582: daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ devamanuṣyamatiṣūpapadyamānānāṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vipākaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1583: niṣyandaphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇa ātmābhāvaparigrahayoḥ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate
T06asabhs_u:1584: adhipattiphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate
T06asabhs_u:1585: kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ sugatau durgatau ca vipāko 'bhinirvarttate
T06asabhs_u:1591: yena ekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhavanākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā anekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā // ekaḥ sattvo 'nekena karmaṇā samanvāgataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1593: kāye yad audārikaṃ pūrvaṃ pacyate cyutikāle pratyupasthitaṃ vā pūrvaṃ bahulīkāratāṃ gataṃ vā atrasamācaritaṃ vā /
T06asabhs_u:1595: yaduktaṃ sūtre trividhaṃ karma puṇyakarma apuṇya karma āniṃjyakarma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1601: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma // yaduktaṃ sūtre avidyālambanāḥ saṃskārāḥ puṇyāniṃjyā apuṇyāniṃjyāśceti /
T06asabhs_u:1618: yaduktaṃ sūtre sādhāraṇaṃ karma asādhāraṇaṃ karma valavatkarma durvalaṃ karma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1620: yatkarma bhājanaloke nānāvidhaṃ vikalpaṃ karoti // asādhāraṇaṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1621: yatkarma sattvaloke nānavidhaṃ vikalpaṃ karoti // api ca sattvānāmanyonyādhipateyaṃ karmāpi
T06asabhs_u:1625: yathā sattvānāmānyaiḥ sattvaiḥ saha anyonyaṃ darśanādikaṃ nopabhogo nopalabdhiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1630: prātipakṣikakarmabalavataḥ sarvaṃ saṃcetanīyaṃ kuśalaṃ karma balavadityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1631: tatkarma niśrityoktaṃ bhagavatā mamāryaśrāvakā apramāṇavaipulyakarmaṇi cittaṃ kuśalaṃ paribhāvayanti abhisaṃskṛte sapramāṇe karmaṇi nākṣipanti nāvasthāpayanti na parihāpayanti tatsaṃkhyāte
T06asabhs_u:1632: / yadapi pratipakṣadurbalapugdalasya saṃcetanīyamakuśalaṃ karma tadapi kuśalātkarmaṇo (Abhidh-s 56) balavadityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1633: yat punaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma niyatavipākamaprahīṇamaparijñātaṃ tad balavat karma ityucyate
T06asabhs_u:1634: tanmanasi nidhāyoktaṃ sarvaṃ ca kuśalākuśalaṃ karma niyatavipākamāryamārgeṇa prahīṇaṃ balavat karma ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1635: yadapi kāmapratisaṃyuktamakuśalaṃ karma yadapi pūrvamabhyastaṃ yadapi padasthaṃ yadapyasādhyamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ karma aparinirvāṇadharmataḥ tadapi prakṛtyā balavat karma ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1638: tadyathā kṣetrataḥ vastutaḥ svabhāvataḥ āśrayataḥ manasikārataḥ āśayataḥ sahāyataḥ bahulīkārataḥ bāhujanyataśca // tadviparyeṇa durbalaṃ karma //
T06asabhs_u:1639: bhagavatoktaṃ ya evaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso na bhavatyavakāśaśca na prajñāyate samyag duḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai
T06asabhs_u:1640: / yastvevaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalo yathāvedanīyaṃ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā yathāvedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata
T06asabhs_u:1641: ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso bhavatyavakāśaśca prajñāyate samyag duḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai
T06asabhs_u:1643: tatra buddhā manasyevaṃ mithyāvacanaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāmayante
T06asabhs_u:1644: / yat sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate
T06asabhs_u:1649: sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
T06asabhs_u:1661: prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma anāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma ca // prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1663: bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇavasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerī saṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvaraḥ upāsikāsaṃvaraḥ upavāsasaṃvaraśca // katamaṃ pugdalamadhikṛtya pravrajitasaṃvaro vyavasthāpitaḥ duścaritavivekacaritaṃ kāmavivekacaritaṃ pugdalamadhikṛtya /
T06asabhs_u:1665: duścaritavivekacaritamadhikṛtya no tu kāmavivekacaritaṃ pugdalam // kaṃ pugdalamadhikṛtyopavāsasaṃvaro vyavasthāpitaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1678: dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ vījopaghāte sati kāmebhyo vītarāgasya yā viratiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1688: abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato vā tatkarmādhyācāraniścayaḥ asaṃvara ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1690: aurabhrikāḥ kaukkṛṭikāḥ śaukarikāḥ śākunikāḥ mātsyikāḥ lubdhakāḥ vāgurikāḥ corāḥ ghātakāḥ govaṃdhakāḥ nāgavaṃdhakāḥ māṇḍalikāḥ nāgamaṇḍalikāḥ kārāgārikāḥ sūcakāḥ upaghātakāḥ prabhṛtayaḥ naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvara saṃgṛhītaṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1693: sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karma ca // sukhavedanīyaṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1694: kāmāvacarāt tṛtīyadhyānaṃ yāvad yat kuśalaṃ karma // duḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1698: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma ca //
T06asabhs_u:1700: tatkarma dṛṣṭe dharme yasya vipāko vipacyate /
T06asabhs_u:1701: tacca maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasyaṃ parihāṇiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate // yathā maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasya tathā araṇasamāpatteruccalitasya niurodhasamāpatteruccalitasya
T06asabhs_u:1703: buddhapramukhe saṃghe kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate // anyeṣāṃ tīvrāśayaprayogeṇa kuśalākuśalakarmapratipannānāmapi dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko
T06asabhs_u:1705: tatkarma anantare janmani yasya vipāko vipacyate /
T06asabhs_u:1707: api ca yānyanyāni kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi yeṣāmanantare janmani vipāko vipacyate tatsarvamucyate upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma // aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1711: kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākaṃ karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ karma akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ karma // kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākaṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1716: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ karma yat karma vā āśayataḥ prayogato vā śuklaṃ yat karma vā prayogataḥ kṛṣṇamāśayataḥ śuklam // akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ karma katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1717: prayogānantaryamārge 'nāsravaṃ karma aviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasyānāsravakarmaṇaḥ paripanthamānukūlyasvabhāvamadhikṛtya vaṃkadoṣakaṣāyāṇāṃ śauceyānāṃ mauneyānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
T06asabhs_u:1720: nidānataḥ utthānataḥ pradeśataḥ svabhāvataśca dānakarma vikalpyate /
T06asabhs_u:1722: 'mohaśca kuśalamūlāni // utthānaṃ tānyeva cetanāsahagatāni // pradeśo deyāni vastūni // svabhāvo dānasaṃpattikāle kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi //
T06asabhs_u:1725: api ca aniśritadānataḥ mahāśucidānataḥ parama prahṛṣṭadānataḥ abhikṣṇadānataḥ kṣetrabhājanadānataḥ navapurāṇasaṃvibhāgadānataśca dānasaṃpad veditavyā //
T06asabhs_u:1727: anabhidutadeyavastutaḥ aparāpakṛtadeyavastutaḥ akuthitavimaladeyavastutaḥ śucideyavastutaḥ dharmārjitadeyavastutaśca deyasaṃpad veditavyā //
T06asabhs_u:1729: tathācoktaṃ sūtre śīlasamanvāgataḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta ācāragocarasaṃpanno 'ṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu mahābhayadarśī śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu
T06asabhs_u:1736: kathamaṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu mahābhayadarśī bhavati // tīvreṇa gauraveṇa śīlaśikṣaṇataḥ // kathaṃ śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu /
T06asabhs_u:1738: ataḥ paraṃ śīlamārabhya yad buddhena sūtreṣu nirdṛṣṭaṃ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavatītyevamādi // kathamucyate kāyena vācā saṃvṛto bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1741: avipratisārādīnāṃ krameṇa saṃpratipattyā yāvat samādhilābhasanniśraya taḥ
T06asabhs_u:1754: guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu cānihitamānataḥ // kathaṃ pradakṣiṇakāyāyavāksamudācāro bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1761: karmasvakā karmadāyādāḥ karmayonīyāḥ karmapratisaraṇāḥ karma sarvān sattvān vibhajati uccanīcatayā hīnapraṇītatayā (Abhidh-s 61) iti // kathaṃ sattvāḥ karmasvakā bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:1763: svayaṃ kṛtakarmavipākapratisaṃvedanatāyāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmanyonyadāyādatāmupādāya // kathaṃ karmayonīyā bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:1766: yat karmaṇā sugatau durgatau vātmabhāvaprabhedaṃ labhante // kathaṃ hīnapraṇītā bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:1771: akuśalasya karmaṇo hīnāsu tisṛṣu durgatiṣu aniṣṭavipākalābhaścintyaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1778: tadyathā āyurvaśitayā cittavaśitayā pariṣkāravaśitayā karmavaśitayā upapattivaśitayā adhimuktivaśitayā praṇidhānavaśitayā ṛddhivaśitayā jñānavaśitayā dharmavaśitayā /
T06asabhs_u:1781: tathā ca samudayasatyaṃ samāsato lakṣaṇaprabhedena caturvidham /
T06asabhs_u:1784: punarbhavavāsanāyā āhārakaṃ kāraṇaṃ heturiti hetulakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam // samudayalakṣaṇaṃ katamat
T06asabhs_u:1785: teṣāṃ teṣāmupacitavāsanānāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye udayasya kāraṇamiti (Abhidh-s 62) samudayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam // prabhuvalakṣaṇaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1786: pratyātmaṃ santānānāṃ sarvaprakāraprakarṣodbhavasya kāraṇamiti prabhavalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam // pratyalakṣaṇaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1790: lakṣaṇataḥ gāmbhīryataḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthataḥ aparipūritaḥ paripūritaḥ niralaṃkārataḥ sālaṃkārataḥ śeṣataḥ aśeṣataḥ agrataḥ paryāyataśca nirodhasatyaṃ veditavyam //
T06asabhs_u:1792: tathatāyāmārya mārge kleśānāmanutpādo yo nirodhāśrayo nirodhako nirodhasvabhāvo vā // tannirodhasatyalakṣaṇam // yaduktaṃ bhagavatā cakṣuḥ śrotre ghrāṇajivhākāyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1793: manaśca teṣu āyataneṣu nāmarūpayorātyantikanirodho na śeṣaḥ iti /
T06asabhs_u:1794: yaccoktaṃ tadāyatanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā cakṣuśca nirudhyate rūpasaṃjñā ca virajyate yāvat manaśca nirudhyate dharmasaṃjñā ca virajyate iti /
T06asabhs_u:1795: anena nayena ālambanānāṃ prāpaṇaṃ tathatāyāmālambanādūrdhvaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1799: tathoparamāt teṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodho nānyo vācyaḥ nānanyo vācyaḥ nāpyanyo nāpyananyo vācyaḥ na naivānyo nānanyo vācyaḥ // kutaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1801: asmiṃstvarthe prapañcotpattiḥ na saṃcintyā na mārgeṇa na nyāyena na kuśalaprayogeṇa cintyā iti /
T06asabhs_u:1802: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ spraṣṭāvyayatanānāṃ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /
T06asabhs_u:1803: syādanyaḥ syādananyaḥ syādanyo 'pi nānyo 'pi (Abhidh-s 63) syānnaivānyo nānanyo 'pi iti niṣprapañca prapañca utpadyate // yāvat ṣaḍāyatanāni tāvat
T06asabhs_u:1804: prapañcāḥ // yadā ṣaḍāyatanānāṃ nirodhaśchedaḥ tadā prapañcānāṃ viratiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1808: āryaprajñayā bījanirmūlanena yo nirodho labhyate // aparipūritaḥ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1809: śaikṣāṇāṃ strotāpannaphalasaṃgraheṇa vā sakṛdāgamiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā anāgāmiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā yo nirodhaḥ // paripūritaḥ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1812: ubhayabhāga vimuktānāṃ traividyānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñānāmarhatāṃ yo nirodhaḥ // śeṣataḥ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1818: aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargaḥ vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi // kimupādāyocyate aśeṣaprahāṇam /
T06asabhs_u:1829: lakṣaṇatrayavirahatāmupādāya // kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punardurdarśa ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1832: matiṣu saṃcārabirahamāmupādāya // kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punaramata mityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1849: sarvakleśasantāpavirahatāṃ sarvecchālābhaduḥkhamahāsantāpavirahatāṃ copādāya // kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punarniṣpadāridāhamiotyute /
T06asabhs_u:1850: sarva śokaparidevanāduḥkhadaurmanasya vikṣepavirahatāmupādāya // kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punaḥ kṣemamityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1851: hiṃsā bhayarahitavihārapadasthānatāmupādāya // kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punaḥ śivamityucyate
T06asabhs_u:1857: sarvāvaraṇaro gavirahatāmupādāya // kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punarārnijyamityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1880: yena duḥkhaṃ parijānīte samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T06asabhs_u:1881: etat saṃkṣepeṇa mārgasatyalakṣaṇamityucyate // punaḥ mārgaḥ pañcavidhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1884: pṛthagjanānāṃ śīlam indriyadvārarakṣā bhojane mātrājñatā prathamarātrau taduttararātriṣu vā nityamamiddhaṃ vīryabhāvanā śamathavipaśyanā saṃprajanyavihāraśca // yadvā punaranyadaupaniṣadaṃ kuśalam śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā bhāvanāmayī prajñā //
T06asabhs_u:1889: saṃbhāramārgopacitāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni ūṣmagataḥ mūrdhānaḥ satyānukūlakṣānti laukikāgradharmaśca // ūṣmagataṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1890: pratyātmaṃ satye pvālokalabdhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca // mūrdhānaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1891: pratyātmaṃ satyeṣvālokavṛddhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca // satyānukūlakṣāntiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:1892: pratyātmaṃ satyeṣvekadeśapraviṣṭānusṛtaḥ (Abhidh-s 66) samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca // laukikāgradharmaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1895: samāsato laukikā gradharmānantaramanupalambhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca // samasamālambyālambanajñāmapi tat /
T06asabhs_u:1900: 'nvayajñānaṃ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye dharmajñānaṃ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānaṃ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ nirodhe dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ nirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ mārge dharmajñānaṃ mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ mārge
T06asabhs_u:1906: pūrvādhipatibalavicāraṇāmupādāya pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatye pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā
T06asabhs_u:1908: tasmāducyate duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiriti // duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1909: kṣāntyanantaraṃ yena jñānena pūrvoktebhyaḥ kleśebhyo vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T06asabhs_u:1912: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāne ca pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā utpadyate yaduttaramanvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇām /
T06asabhs_u:1913: tasmāducyate duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntiḥ // duḥkhe anvayajñānaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1921: api ca eṣu sarveṣu kṣāntijñāneṣu animittaprekṣāvihārī veditavyaḥ // ime ṣoḍaśa cittakṣaṇā
T06asabhs_u:1927: tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena prāpaṇanimittapramāṇaiḥ nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ mārgasatyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti
T06asabhs_u:1929: abhisamayaprayuktā laukikena jñānena yathāvyavasthānaṃ vikalpoyanto yadabhyasyanti // anubhavataḥ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1930: tathābhyasyanto mayā (?yadā)dito darśanamārgākhyāṃ lokottarāṃ niṣprapañcāvasthāṃ pratyātmamanubhavati // paripūritaḥ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:1933: yaduktaṃ sūtre virajño vītamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūdapādi iti /
T06asabhs_u:1935: tatra dharmakṣāntibhirvirajaḥ dharmajñānairvītamalam parijñayā prahāṇena mārgaśuddhilābhena ca //
T06asabhs_u:1936: yaduktaṃ sūtre dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā sarvaiḥ tīrṇakāṃkṣaḥ tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayaḥ śāstuḥ śāsano
T06asabhs_u:1944: aparapratyayaḥ mārgabhāvanāyāṃ na parataḥ svayaṃ kuśalāvarjanena /
T06asabhs_u:1948: darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ laukiko mārgo lokottaramārgaḥ mṛdumārgo madhyamārgo 'dhimātro mārgaḥ prayogamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1951: laukikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamākāśānattyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanamākiñcatyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca // ta ete dhyānārūpyāḥ
T06asabhs_u:1953: catvāryavyākṛtamūlāni tṛṣṇā dṛṣṭirmāno 'vidyā ca // tṛṣṇayā āsvāda saṃkleśena saṃkliśyate // dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭyuttaradhyāyitayā saṃkliśyate /
T06asabhs_u:1956: tathā ca saṃkliṣṭacetasāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ pravarttante // kathaṃ vyavadānataḥ
T06asabhs_u:1957: śuddhakā dhyānārūpyāḥ kuśalatvād vyavadātā ityucyante // kathaṃ vyavasthānataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1961: pañcāṅgāni vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca // dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ caturaṅgam
T06asabhs_u:1962: catvāryaṅgāni adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāpratā ca // tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgam
T06asabhs_u:1963: pañcāṅgāni upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca // caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ caturaṅgam
T06asabhs_u:1964: catvāryaṅgāni upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā cittaikāgratā ca //
T06asabhs_u:1965: pratipakṣāṅgamupādāya anuśaṃsāṅgamupādāya tadubhayāśrayasvabhāvāṅgaṃ copādāya ārupyeṣvaṅgavyavasthānaṃ nāsti /
T06asabhs_u:1969: evaṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca // sapta manaskārāḥ katame /
T06asabhs_u:1970: lakṣaṇaprati saṃvedī manaskāraḥ ādhimokṣikaḥ prāvivejaḥ ratisaṃgrāhakaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ prayoganiṣṭhaḥ prayoganiṣṭhāphalaśca (Abhidh-s
T06asabhs_u:1974: mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitasya prathamasya dhyānasya phalaṃ trividhā prathamā dhyānopapattiḥ
T06asabhs_u:1975: yathā prathamasya dhyānasya evaṃ śiṣṭānāṃ dhyānānāṃ trividhā dhyānopapattiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1979: teṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nāmābhijñā api na bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:1981: prāntakoṭikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvannaiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ viśuddhirityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:1983: bhāvanāmārge duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni dharmajñānānvayapakṣyāṇi taiśca saṃprayuktaḥ samādhiḥ prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ, laukikameva aparisphuṭaṃ saṃjñāpracāratāmupādāya /
T06asabhs_u:1984: tata ścānimittamityucyate // yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yāvadeva saṃjñāsamāpattiḥ tāvadājñāprativedha iti /
T06asabhs_u:1991: mṛdumṛdurmṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇā kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmāvadhimātrādhimātramadhimātramadhyamadhimātrāmṛduṃ kleśaprakāra prajahāti //
T06asabhs_u:1993: madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau madhyādhimātraṃ madhyamadhyaṃ madhyamṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
T06asabhs_u:1996: 'dhimātrādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau mṛdvadhimātraṃ mṛdumadhyaṃ mṛdumṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
T06asabhs_u:1999: yasyānantaraṃ nirantaraḥ kleśaḥ prahīṇo bhavati // vimuktimārgaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2000: yena prahīṇe kleśe vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti // viśeṣamārgaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2002: api khalu kleśaprahāṇaprayogaṃ nirākṛtya dharmacintāyāṃ vā prayuktasya dharmavihāre vā samāpattiviśeṣe vā yo mārgaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2003: api khalu vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharato vā yo mārgaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2005: pratilaṃbhabhāvanā niṣevaṇabhāvanā nirdhāvanabhāvanā pratipakṣabhāvanā ca // pratilambhabhāvanā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2006: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādāya yā bhāvanā // niṣevaṇabhāvanā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2007: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai yā bhāvanā
T06asabhs_u:2009: utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya yā bhāvanā // pratipakṣabhāvanā katamā
T06asabhs_u:2010: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśakunāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya (Abhidh-s 71) yā bhāvanā // api khalu mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāmava sthāpayati sā pratilambhabhāvanā
T06asabhs_u:2011: / sa eva saṃmukhībhūto bhāvanāṃ gacchati sā niṣevaṇabhāvanā /
T06asabhs_u:2014: api khalu caturvidhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣaḥ dūrībhāvapratipakṣaśca pratipakṣabhāvanetyucyate //
T06asabhs_u:2021: api khalu vastuparīkṣāmārgaḥ vyāvasāyiko mārgaḥ samādhiparikarmamārgaḥ abhisamayaprāyogiko mārgaḥ abhisamayaśliṣṭo mārgaḥ abhisamayamārgaḥ viśuddhinairyāṇiko mārgaḥ niśrayendriyabhinno mārgaḥ śikṣātrayapariśodhano mārgaḥ sarvaguṇanirhārako mārgaḥ mārgasaṃgrahamārgaśca mārga ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:2022: sa punareṣa yathākramaṃ saptatriṃśadabodhipakṣā dharmāḥ catasraḥ pratipadaḥ catvāri dharmapadāni śamatha(ai) vipaśyanā triṇī cendriyāṇī //
T06asabhs_u:2023: smṛtyupasthānānāmālamvanaṃ svabhāvaḥ sahāyaḥ bhāvanā bhāvanāphalañca veditavyam /
T06asabhs_u:2026: kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ // api khalvātmāśrayavastu ātmopabhogavastu ātmavastu ātmasaṃkleśavyavadānavastu ca // svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2030: adhyātmaṃ kāyādiṣu kāyādyanupaśyanā // yathā adhyātmamevaṃ bahirdhā adhyātmavahirdhā
T06asabhs_u:2040: adhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannā vedanā // bahirddhā vedanā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2043: adhyātmābahirddhākāyamupādāyotpannāvedanā // yathā vedanā evaṃ cittaṃ dharmāḥ // yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā evaṃ vedanādiṣu vedanādyanupaśyanā
T06asabhs_u:2045: api khalu bhāvanā chando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāhaḥ utsūḍhiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ apramādaśca // chandabhāvanā amanasikaropakleśapratipakṣeṇa /
T06asabhs_u:2047: vyāyāmabhāvanā layauddhatyopakleśapratipakṣeṇa // utsāhabhāvanā cetaso 'līnatvopakleśapratipakṣeṇa // utsūḍhibhāvanā viṣādaparisravaparikhedopakleśapratipakṣeṇa // aprativāṇibhāvanā kuśalapakṣeṇa alpamātra saṃtuṣṭyupakleśapratipakṣeṇa // smṛtibhāvanā bhagavataḥ śāsane saṃmoṣopakleśapratipakṣeṇa // saṃprajanyabhāvanā āpattivipratisāropakleśapratipakṣeṇa // apramādabhāvanā kuśaleṣu nikṣiptadhuratopakleśapratipakṣeṇa // bhāvanāphalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2055: taduktaṃ sūtre chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryamārabhate cittaṃ pragṛṇhāti cittaṃ pradadhāti
T06asabhs_u:2064: niṣpajñena samādhinā yatkaraṇīyaṃ kṛtyam // svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2066: chandovīryaṃ cittaṃ mīmāṃsā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ // chandasamādhiḥ katamaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2069: yatsātatya prayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām // cittasamādhiḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2070: pūrvasamādhibhāvanāmāgamya svarasena spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām // mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ katamaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2071: deśanādharmaśravaṇamāgamya pratyātmaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām // punaḥ chandasamādhiḥ yat chandaṃ janayan spṛśati
T06asabhs_u:2072: cittasyaikagratām // vīryasamādhiḥ yat vīryamārapramāṇaḥ spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām // cittasamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pradadhat spṛśati cittasyaigratām // mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pragṛṇhan spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām // bhāvanā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2075: chandaḥ vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā praśrabdhiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ cetanā upekṣā ca /
T06asabhs_u:2079: nidānaṃ saṃkṣepavikṣepa parivarjanabhāvana alīnatvāvikṣepatadubhayāśrayānukūlabhāvanā ca // phalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2081: api ca teṣu teṣu dharmeṣu adhigamaḥ prātiḥ karmaṇyatā vaśitā kāritraṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nānāvidhānāmṛdudhyādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ niṣpādanamadhiguṇānāṃ nirhāraśca //
T06asabhs_u:2085: śraddhā vīrya smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā ca // sahāya katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2099: smṛtiḥ dharmavicayaḥ vīryaṃ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ samādhiḥ upekṣā ca // smṛtiḥ saṃniśrayāṅgam
T06asabhs_u:2109: yathā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ tathā yāvat upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam // ebhiḥ catubhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ
T06asabhs_u:2115: samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyakkarmmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiśca
T06asabhs_u:2124: bhāvanā tu bodhyaṅgavat // bhāvanā phalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2127: duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā // prathamā mṛdvindriyāṇāmanupalabdhamauladhyānam /
T06asabhs_u:2137: adhyātmaṃ cittasya upanibandhaḥ sthāpanā saṃsthāpanā avasthāpanā upasthāpanā damanaṃ śamanaṃ vyupaśamanam ekotīkaraṇaṃ samādhānaṃ ca // vipaśyanā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2138: yā dharmān vicinoti pravivinoti parivitarkkayati parimīmāṃsamāpataye /
T06asabhs_u:2139: ca kāma pratipakṣadauṣṭhulyanimittasaṃyojanataḥ kāmābhibhavānāṃ viparyāsataḥ aviparyastacittasyāvasthāpanataśca // api khalu śamathavipaśyanāmāgamya
T06asabhs_u:2145: ekatyaḥ na śamathasya lābhī nāpi vipaśyanāyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2148: tasya śamathavipaśyanobhayamārga yuktasya samaṃ yugapat pravṛttiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2152: prayogamārge pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam // ājñendriyaṃ katamat ṣoḍaśāt darśanamārgacittakṣaṇādrūdhvaṃ sarvasmin śaikṣamārge yadindriyam // ājñātāvīndriyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2154: prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakānyapi bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
T06asabhs_u:2156: yathā prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti tathā sarvepāmūrdvabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge adhobhūmikāni kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
T06asabhs_u:2161: tadanantaraṃ nirantarāśrayapravṛttiḥ prāptakṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ daśāśaikṣā dharmāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2163: aśaikṣasya samyagdṛṣṭiryāyada śaikṣasya samyaksamādhiḥ aśaikṣasya samyagvimokṣaḥ aśaikṣasya samyag jñānaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2164: evamādayo dharmā niṣṭhāmārga ucyate // katamāni sarvadauṣṭhulyāni /
T06asabhs_u:2166: tadyathā sarvatragamabhilāpadauṣṭhulyaṃ veditadauṣṭhulyaṃ kleśadauṣṭhulyaṃ karmadauṣṭhulyaṃ vipākadauṣṭhulyaṃ kleśāvaraṇādauṣṭhulyaṃ karmāvaraṇadauṣṭhulyaṃ vipākāvaraṇadauṣṭhulyaṃ nivaraṇadauṣṭhulyaṃ vitarkkadauṣṭhulyaṃ āhāradauṣṭhulyaṃ maithunadauṣṭhulyaṃ svapnadauṣṭhulyaṃ vyādhidauṣṭhulyaṃ jarādauṣṭhulyaṃ maraṇadauṣṭhulyaṃ pariśramadauṣṭhulyaṃ dṛḍhadauṣṭhulyam
T06asabhs_u:2167: audārikadauṣṭhulyaṃ madhyadauṣṭhulyaṃ sūkṣmadauṣṭhulyaṃ samāpattyāvaraṇadauṣṭhulyaṃ jñeyāvaraṇadauṣṭhulyaṃ ca // saṃyogaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2169: dauṣṭhulyavikṣipteṣu visaṃyogalābhateti vijñaptiḥ // vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2170: bhāvanāmārgagatasya taduttaraṃ saṃyojanaprahāṇamārgavasthāyāṃ yaḥ samādhiḥ prayogamārgasaṃgraho vā ānantaryamārgasaṃgraho vā /
T06asabhs_u:2171: prayogamārgasaṃgrahastu tataḥ paraṃ sarvairāvaraṇairacchādyaḥ sarvāvarāṇānāṃ ca bhedaka iti
T06asabhs_u:2173: sa ca samādhiḥ nirantaraḥ dṛḍhaḥ ekarasaḥ vyāpī ca // etadarthapratibimbanārthaṃ (Abhidh-s 77) bhagavatoktaṃ tadyathā mahāśailaparvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekaghanaḥ susaṃvṛtto daśadigvātākampyaśca // katamā nāma nirantarāśrayapravṛttiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2178: hetukṣayeṇa yad śānaṃ labhyate kṣayaviṣayā lambanaṃ vā // anutpādajñānaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2179: phalaprahāṇena yad jñānaṃ labhyate phalānutpattiviṣayālambanaṃ vā // daśāśaikṣā dharmāstu
T06asabhs_u:2180: śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2182: mārgalakṣaṇaṃ nyāyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipadlakṣaṇaṃ nairyāṇikalakṣaṇaṃ ca // kimupādāya mārgalakṣaṇam
T06asabhs_u:2187: satyeṣu ṣoḍaśākārāḥ laukikā lokottarāśca // laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ ca
T06asabhs_u:2189: jñeye akuśalapraveśakuśalyapraveśastrabhāvaprabhedataḥ sāvaraṇanirāvaraṇasvabhāvaprabhedataḥ savikalpanirvikalpasvabhāvaprabhedataśca // kena hetunā satyeṣu
T06asabhs_u:2191: tathāgata aprativedhataḥ kleśānuśayataḥ abhilāpamukhena prapañcanataśca // lokottarākārāḥ tadviparyayeṇa /
