T06asabhs_u:2192: lokottarākāreṣu varttamāno 'nityārthaṃ paśyati sākṣādanubhavati notvanityaṃ paśyati abhilāpaprapañcamukhena
T06asabhs_u:2193: yathā anityākārā anityārthe evaṃ śiṣṭhākarāḥ śiṣṭārtheṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2199: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānam avadānam itivṛtakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyam adbhutadharmaḥ upadeśaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2202: daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyan tathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati sukhaṃ vyavasthāpayati sukhaṃ deśayati /
T06asabhs_u:2203: śrotāpi sukhamudgṛṇhāti dharmagauravatayā kṣipraṃ bodhi saṃbhārān paripūrayati āśudharmatāṃ pratividhyati /
T06asabhs_u:2204: buddhe 'vetyaprasādaṃ labhate dharme saṃghe cāvetya prasādaṃ labhate /
T06asabhs_u:2209: sūtrāṇāṃ madhye vā ante vā gāthayā yad gīyate /
T06asabhs_u:2218: dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī paṃcapadī ṣaṭpadī vā //
T06asabhs_u:2243: evaṃ sūtrādīni dvādaśāṅgānyāryaśāsanāni triṣu piṭakeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2248: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ caitāni pañca śrāvakāṇāṃ piṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2249: nidānamavadānamitivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ caitāni catvāri dvayoḥ piṭakayoḥ saparivāre vinayapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2250: vaipulyamadbhutadharmaśca ete dve bodhisattvapiṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhīte bhavataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2251: upadeśa ekaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvapiṭakayoḥ abhidharmapiṭake saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:2258: adhiprajñaśikṣāniṣpādanakāmatāmupādāya abhidharmapiṭakavyavasthānam // punaḥ samyag dharmārthavyutpattikāmatāmupādāya sūtrapiṭakavyavasthānam /
T06asabhs_u:2262: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2263: śrutamaya cintāmayabhāvanāmayānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gocaraḥ // yaduktaṃ sutre cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ sālambanāḥ sākāraḥ sāśrayāḥ sasaṃprayogāśca /
T06asabhs_u:2273: savikalpapratibimbālambanaṃ nirvikalpaprativimbālambanaṃ vastuparyantālambanaṃ kāryapariniṣpattyālambanaṃ ca // savikalpapratibimbālambanaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2277: sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣayabhāvikatā yathāvadbhāvikatā ca // kṣayabhāvikatā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2279: catvāri āryasatyāni ṣoḍaśākārāḥ tathatā sarve anityāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve duḥkhā saṃskārāḥ sarve 'nātmāno dharmāḥ nirvāṇaṃ śāntaṃ
T06asabhs_u:2297: skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyuasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2301: yat dharmā dharmānabhiniṣyandayanti nahyeṣāṃ nirhetuko nāpi viṣamahetuka utpāda itīdaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam
T06asabhs_u:2304: yad adhobhūmikānāmaudarikatā ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ śāntatā tathatā catvāryasatyāni ca /
T06asabhs_u:2312: pṛthaglakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ kāryakāraṇāni // upapattisādhanayuktiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2313: upapattisādhanārthaṃ sādhyasyārthasya prāmāṇāviruddha upadeśaḥ // dharmatāyuktiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2314: anādikālāt svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇasthitadharmeṣu yā dharmatāpariniṣpattiḥ sā dharmatā // iti dharmeṣu vicāraṇā //
T06asabhs_u:2328: nāmaparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ /
T06asabhs_u:2338: saṃbhṛtabodhisaṃbhārasya ūṣmagatādiṣu āryasatyeṣu ca yad vāhuśrutyam //
T06asabhs_u:2342: grāhyagrāhakānupalabdhijñānam // etadadhikṛtya suṣṭhu uktaṃ buddhena bhagavatā
T06asabhs_u:2362: ubhayamāgamyobhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārī bhavati // udgrahāya svādhyāyadeśanābhiḥ śrutamayaṃ draṣṭavyam // samadhiprayogāsantuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ draṣṭavyam // prayogaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogeṇāviparītaprayogeṇa ca draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2365: pāramitānāṃ saṃkhyānirddeśatāmupādāya lakṣaṇanirddeśatāmupādāya kramanirdeśatāmupādāya niruktinirdeśatāmupādāya bhāvanānirdeśatā mupādāya prabhedanirdeśatāmupādāya saṃgrahanirdeśatāmupādāya vipakṣanirdeśatāmupādaya guṇavarṇananirdeśatāmupādāya anyo
T06asabhs_u:2367: kena kāraṇena vaipulyaṃ audāryaṃ gāmbhīrya ca deśyate /
T06asabhs_u:2369: udāragambhīratāmupādaya // kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyā(ḥ) sattvā audāryagāmbhīryaṃ nādhimucyante uttrasanti /
T06asabhs_u:2371: (Abhidh-s 84) anavaropitakuśalamūlatāmupādāya pāpamitraparigrahatāṃ copādāya // kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyāḥ sattvā adhimucyante /
T06asabhs_u:2374: idaṃ ca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye bodhisattvasya yathāruta mayoniśo dharmānvicinvataḥ aṣṭāviṃśatirasadṛṣṭaya utpadyante //
T06asabhs_u:2376: nimittadṛṣṭiḥ prajñaptyapavādadṛṣṭiḥ parikalpāpavādadṛṣṭiḥ tattvāpavādadṛṣṭiḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiḥ anavadyatādṛṣṭiḥ niḥsaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ avajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiḥ viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiḥ anabhyupagamadṛṣṭiḥ kusṛtidṛṣṭiḥ satkāradṛṣṭi dṛḍhamūḍhatādṛṣṭiḥ mūladṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭāvadṛṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ prayoganirākaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ anairyāṇikadṛṣṭiḥ āvaraṇopacayadṛṣṭiḥ apuṇyaprasavadṛṣṭiḥ vaiphalyadṛṣṭiḥ nigrāhyadṛṣṭiḥ abhyākhyānadṛṣṭiḥ akathyadṛṣṭiḥ mahādṛṣṭiḥ abhimānadṛṣṭiśca
T06asabhs_u:2382: // anutpannā aniruddhā ādiśāntā(ḥ) prakṛtiparinirvṛtā iti ko 'bhisandhiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2400: tatra pañcavidhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvattirtamiti darśayati /
T06asabhs_u:2401: pañcavidhā bhāvanā saṃbhinnabhāvanā animittabhāvanā anābhogabhāvanā uttaptabhāvanā parivṛttinibhaḥ(?) bhāvanā yathākramam //
T06asabhs_u:2402: kena kāraṇena vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakadharmaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya
T06asabhs_u:2412: roga caritaprabhedataḥ niryāṇaprabhedataḥ ādhāraprabhedataḥ prayogaprabhedataḥ phalaprabhedataḥ dhātuprabhedataḥ caryāprabhedataśca //
T06asabhs_u:2415: rāgacaritaḥ dveṣacarita mohacaritaḥ mānacaritaḥ vitarkacaritaḥ samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaska caritaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ // niryāṇaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2425: śraddhādhimuktaḥ dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimuktaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ strotāpattiphalapratipakṣakaḥ strotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ anāgāmī arhattvaphalapratipannakaḥ arhan saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ kulaṃkulaḥ ekavīcikaḥ antarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī ūrddvaṃstrotāḥ parihāṇadharmā arhan cetanādharmā arhan anurakṣaṇādharmā arhan sthitākampyaḥ arhan prativedhadharmā arhan akopyadharmā arhan ca pudgalaprabhedaḥ // dhātuprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2429: kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaraśca bodhisattvaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ acintyaśca tathāgataḥ pudgalaprabhedaḥ // caryāprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2431: adhimukticārī bodhisattvaḥ adhyāśayacārī bodhisattvaḥ nimittacārī bodhisattvaḥ animittacāri bodhisattvaḥ anabhisaṃskāracārī bodhisattvaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2434: evaṃ dveṣacarito mohacarito mānacarito vitarkacaritaśca pudgalaḥ tīvrāyataviśiṣṭaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2439: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā śrāvakadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyaḥ svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ śrāvakapiṭakamavalambya vīryabhāvanayā dharmānudharmacārī duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti // pratyekabuddhayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2440: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā pratyekabuddhadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā madhyendriyaḥ svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ kevalabhāvanayā cādhigatavodhyāśayaḥ śrāvakapiṭakamavalambya vīryabhāvanayā
T06asabhs_u:2441: dharmānudharmacārī anutpāditapūrvanirvedhabhāgīyaḥ utpāditapūrvanirvedhabhāgīyaḥ aprāptapūrvaphalaḥ abuddhalaukikaḥ adhyātma cetanayā ārya mārgasaṃmukhībhūtaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ ekavihārī pratyekajinaḥ varggacāri duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti // mahāyānikaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2442: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā bodhisattvadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sarvasattvavimokṣāya praṇihitaḥ apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇāśayaḥ bodhisattvapiṭakamavalambya vīryabhāvanayā dharmānudharmacārī sattvān paripācayati śuddhāṃ buddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratilabhate samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca sākṣātkaroti //
T06asabhs_u:2444: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya mṛdumātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ mṛdumātrāmokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ aniyatajanmakālikaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2446: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya madhyamātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ madhyamātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgato niyatajanmakālikaḥ // saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2448: tajjanmakālikaḥ // punaḥ asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu mṛdumātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgato mṛdumātra nirvedhabhāgīyasanvāgata anivatajanmakālikaḥ // saṃbhṛtāsaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu madhyamātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ madhyamātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgato nithatajanmakālikaḥ // saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya
T06asabhs_u:2449: satyeṣu adhimātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ adhimātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ tajjanmakālikaḥ // tatra trimātranirvedhabhāgīyo laukikāgradharmaṃ sthāpayitvā laukikāgradharmaprakṛtyaiva kṣaṇikaḥ aprāvandhikaḥ // tajjanmakālikaḥ abhisamayaṃ samāpadyamāno 'pūrvavastha mṛdumadhyādhimātramokṣabhāgīyebhyo
T06asabhs_u:2453: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro mṛdvindriyaḥ paropadeśamanusmṛtya yaḥ satyābhisamayāya prayujyate // dharmānusārī katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2454: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārastīkṣṇendriyaḥ svayameva satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamanusmṛtya yaḥ [satyābhi]samayāya prayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:2458: phalakāle dharmānusārī yaḥ pudgalaḥ // kāyasākṣī katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2459: śaikṣaḥ aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyī yaḥ pudgalaḥ // prajñāvimuktaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2464: nirvedhabhāgīyeṣu pañcadaśasu darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yaḥ pudgalaḥ // strota āpakṣaḥ katamaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2469: kāmeṣvavītarāgaḥ pudgalaḥ samyaktvaniyāmamavakrāman strotaāpanno bhavati // yadbhūyo vītarāgaḥ samyaktvaniyāmamavakrāman sakṛdāgāmī bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:2470: kāmebhyo vītarāgaḥ samyaktvaniyāmamavakrāmannanāgāmī bhavati // yadā darśana prahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt [stota ā]panno bhavati // kena kāraṇena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt strotaāpanno bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:2475: samyaganiryāṇa(kāraṇa)tāṃ copādāya // api khalu jñeyavipra[tipatti]kāraṇatāmupādāya dṛṣṭivipratipattikāraṇatāmupādāya pratipakṣavipratipattikāraṇatāṃ copādāya // sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2476: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2479: kleśaprakā[rasya pra] hāṇamārge yaḥ pugdalaḥ // anāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2480: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ saptamāṣṭamānāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ // anāgāmī pudgalaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2481: bhāvanāmarge kāmāvacarasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ // yadā sarveṣāṃ kāmāvacarā[ṇāṃ bhāva]nāprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmī bhavati //
T06asabhs_u:2484: gatyavara kāraṇatāṃ dhātvaparakāraṇatāṃ copādāya // arhattvaphalapratipannakaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2487: bhāvāmrikasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ // yadā traidhātukānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ
T06asabhs_u:2488: sarvvakleśānāṃ prahāṇādarhan bhavati // kena kāraṇenordbhabhāgīyānāṃ prahāṇādarhannityucyate
T06asabhs_u:2494: strotaāpanna eva pudgalaḥ saptakṛtvo 'pi miśromiśra devamanuṣyeṣu bhavāt saṃsṛtya yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti // kulaṃkulaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2495: deveṣu vā kulātkulaṃ gatvā [manuṣye]ṣu vā yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti // ekavīcikaḥ katamaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2496: sakṛdāgāmī deveṣveva yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti // antarāparinirvāyī katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2497: upapattisaṃyojane prahīṇe abhinivṛttisaṃyojane aprahīṇe antarābhavamabhinirvarttayanneva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti abhinivṛtto vā antarābhave upapattibhavagamanāya cetayannevayo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
T06asabhs_u:2501: ubhayasaṃyojane aprahīṇe rūpadhātāvupapannamātra eva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti // anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2502: upapannaḥ anabhisaṃskāreṇa yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
T06asabhs_u:2504: upapanno 'bhisaṃskāreṇa yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti // ūrdhvaṃstrotāḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2505: upapanno rūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvadakaniṣṭhagān praviśya tannānāsrava mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
T06asabhs_u:2506: puna kaścid yāvad bhavāgragān mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
T06asabhs_u:2507: api ca vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya pañcaprakārā prabhedāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2509: taiḥ vyavakīrṇābhāvitasya caturthadhyānasya pañcaprabhedaiḥ yathākramaṃ paścasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattiḥ
T06asabhs_u:2511: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā cetayitvā vā acetayitvā vā dṛṣṭadharmasukha vihārāt parihāṇameti //
T06asabhs_u:2513: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā acetayitvā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti cetayitvā na parihāṇameti
T06asabhs_u:2518: mṛdvindriya prakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt na parihāṇameti nāpi indriyāṇyuttāpayati //
T06asabhs_u:2520: mṛdvindriyāprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhaviharāt na parihāṇameti kevala mindriyā ṇyuttāpayati // akopyadharmā arhan katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2521: tīkṣṇendriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto va avikṣipto vā na dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti //
T06asabhs_u:2523: kāmadhātāvupapanno bhavati āryadhaprāptaḥ pudgalaḥ ca // kāmāvacaraḥ śaikṣaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2524: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati adharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2526: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati āryadharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2527: saṃyojanaṃ nāvaśiṣyate // yathā kāmāvacarāstrayaḥ tathā rūpāvacarā ārupyavacarā api // kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaro bodhisattvaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2528: ārūpyadhātuvyavakarṣitena dhyānena saṃprayukto dhyānasukhairviharatīti kāmadhātāvapyupapanno rūpadhātāvapyupapannaḥ pudgala kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2531: kāmadhātau tuṣitabhavanayāsamārabhya yāvat mahāparinirvāṇaṃ darśayati sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ buddhacaryāṃ mahācaryāṃ darśayatīti pudgalaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2533: adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito mṛdumadhyādhimātrabodhisattvakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ // adhyāśayacārī bodhisattvaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2536: pramuditāvimalāprabhākaryarciṣmatīsudurjayābhimukhībhūmiṣu sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ // animittacārī bodhisattvaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2537: duraṃgamabhūmau sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ // anabhisaṃskāracārī bodhisattvaḥ pudgalaḥ katamataḥ
T06asabhs_u:2538: acalā sādhumatīdharmameghāsu bhūmiṣu sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2539: punaḥ khalu strotaāpannaḥ pugdalo yaduktaḥ sa dvividhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2541: krasanairyāṇiko yathā purvamuktaḥ // sakṛnnairyāṇikaḥ satyābhisamayamabhisaṃpraviṣṭaḥ aprāpta samāpattimāśritya adhigatena lokottaramāgreṇa sakṛta traidhātukāvacarān sarvakleśān prajahāti prakāraśaḥ prajahāti /
T06asabhs_u:2543: sa ca pudgalo bhūyo dṛṣṭe dharme maraṇakāle ājñāmārāgayati /
T06asabhs_u:2551: ratnābhisamayaḥ asamudācārābhisamayaḥ niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ śrāvakābhisamayaḥ pratyekabuddhābhisamayaḥ bodhisattvābhisamayaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2553: satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrasya adhimuktiprasādasya pratilambhaḥ yathāsaṃpratyayaṃ caryā ca //
T06asabhs_u:2554: arthābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrāyāḥ satyeṣu dhamanidhyānakṣānteḥ pratilambhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2561: bhāvanāmārge tatsaṃvṛtijñānāni pratilabhate na tu saṃmukhīkaroti /
T06asabhs_u:2566: buddhe 'vetya prasādaḥ dharme 'tya prasādaḥ saṃghe 'vetya prasādaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2568: akāraṇasaṃvaralābhāt śikṣāgatasya yadātmano narakakṣayaṃ tiryagyonikṣayaḥ pretayonikṣayaḥ avāṅpatanadurgatikṣayaḥ iti /
T06asabhs_u:2574: śrāvakāṇāṃ parato ghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:2580: pūrvokteṣu saptābhisamayeṣu yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ no tu sakṣātkiryā /
T06asabhs_u:2585: ālambanaviśeṣaḥ upastambhaviśeṣaḥ prativedhaviśeṣaḥ abhyupagamaviśeṣaḥ niryāṇaviśeṣaḥ parigrahaviśeṣaḥ vyavasthānaviśeṣaḥ pratiṣṭhāparivāraviśeṣaḥ abhijanmaviśeṣaḥ janmaviśeṣaḥ phalaviśeṣaśca /
T06asabhs_u:2587: āśrayaparivṛttiviśeṣataḥ guṇasamṛddhiviśeṣataḥ pañcākāraviśeṣataḥ trikāyaviśeṣataḥ nirvāṇaviśeṣataḥ miśropamiśrajñānaśaktilābhaviśeṣataḥ āvaraṇaviśuddhiviśeṣataḥ miśropamiśrakarmakriyāviśeṣataḥ abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasandarśanopāyaviśeṣataḥ pañcākāraparitrāṇaviśeṣataśca veditavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2589: pṛṣṭhābhisamayaniṣṭhābhisamayābhyāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ // teṣāṃ saṃgrahaḥ punaḥ katamaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2590: apramāṇāni vimokṣāḥ abhibhvāyatanāni kṛtsāyatanāni araṇāpraṇīdhijñānam pratisaṃvidaḥ abhijñā lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni pariśuddhayaḥ valāni vaiśāradyāni smṛtyupasthānāni arakṣāṇi asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamuddhātaḥ mahākaruṇā āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā ityevamādayo guṇā yathā sūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2594: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena saṃprayujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ // karuṇā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2595: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā duḥkhena viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // muditā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2597: sukhena na viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // upekṣā katamā
T06asabhs_u:2598: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā hita labheranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2602: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā avibhāvānād draṣṭarī rūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanād vā dṛśya rūpādi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddho samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ yāvad nirmāṇāvaraṇād vimuktiḥ // kathamadhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī vahirddhā rūpāṇi
T06asabhs_u:2604: dhyānaṃ niśritya draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā vibhāvanād arūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanādvā dṛśya rūpāṇi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddhau samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // kathaṃ śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti
T06asabhs_u:2605: / dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣu anyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāyā
T06asabhs_u:2606: anyonyānugamasaṃjñāyā anyonyaikarasasaṃjñāyāśca labhāt tatra labdhe vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat yāvat śubhaśubhanirmāṇāt saṃkleśotpattyāvaraṇācca vimuktiḥ // ākāśānantyāyatanavimokṣaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2607: vimokṣānukūlā kāśānantyāyatanavimokṣaḥ tathā vijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanavimokṣā api draṣṭavyaḥ yāvat vimokṣaḥ śānto vimokṣaḥ asaktyāvaraṇaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2609: naivasaṃjñānasaṃjñāyatanavimokṣaṃ niśritya samatikrāntānāṃ śiṣṭe śānte vimokṣe mokṣānusadṛśo vihāraḥ vihārasamṛddhau ca cittacaitasikānāṃ nirodhaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhāvaraṇād vimuktyartham (Abhidh-s 96)
T06asabhs_u:2612: pūrvāṇī catvāri abhibhvāyatanāni dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ vyavasthāpyante /
T06asabhs_u:2613: uttarāṇi catvāri abhibhvāvatanāni ekena vimokṣeṇa vyavasthāpyante /
T06asabhs_u:2618: mānuṣyakadivyānyāśritya rūpāṇi hīnapraṇītānyucyante // śiṣṭāni yathā vimokṣeṣūktāni //
T06asabhs_u:2623: kṛtsnaspharaṇavihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kṛtsnāyatanānītyucyante // kimupādāya kṛtsnāyataneṣu pṛthivyādivyavasthāpanam /
T06asabhs_u:2625: śiṣṭāni yathāyogaṃ vimokṣavat // tathā ca kṛtsnāyatanaiḥ pariniṣpattirvimokṣāṇām //
T06asabhs_u:2627: dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2629: dhyānaṃ niśritya jñeya jñānapraṇidhisamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2633: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvadharma paryāyeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhīḥ prajñāśeṣaṃ pūrvavat // arthapratisaṃvid katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2634: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇe abhiprāye (Abhidh-s 97) cāvyāghātasamṛddau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // niruktipratisaṃvid katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2635: dhyānaṃ niśritya janapadabhāpāyāmanuvyavahāre dharmanirvacane ca avyāghāta samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // pratibhānapratisaṃvid katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2636: dhyānaṃ niśritya dharmaprabhedeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2640: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrarddhivikurvita samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ // divyaśrotrābhijñā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2641: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrāṇāṃ śabdānāmanuśravasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2643: dhyānaṃ niśritya parasattveṣu cittacaritaparyāya praveśasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2645: dhyānaṃ niśritya pūrvāntacaryānusmaraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2647: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaprakāra saṃdarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2649: dhyānaṃ niśritya āsravakṣayajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2651: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairvibhrājamānasandarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayūktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ tatsamutthitavipākāśca //
T06asabhs_u:2655: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamaśrayasyopādāne sthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhīḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2657: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamālambananirmāṇapariṇāmanajñānānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // cittapariśuddhiḥ katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2658: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ samādhimukhavaśavarttisamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat
T06asabhs_u:2660: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ dhāraṇīmukhasandhāraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat
T06asabhs_u:2664: sthānāsthānabalaṃ katamat dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra sthānāsthānajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ // karmasvakajñānabalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2665: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra karmasvakajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // śiṣṭāni balāni yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni //
T06asabhs_u:2668: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārajñeyābhisaṃbodhipratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ // āsravakṣayavaiśāradyaṃ katamat dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārasravakṣayapratijñā pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2670: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākārāntarāyikadharmapratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat // nairyāṇikapratipadavaiśāradyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2671: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākāra nairyāṇikamārgadharma pratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2674: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe sarvākārasaṃkleśāsamudācārasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ purvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2676: trīṇyeravārakṣāṇi // gaṇaparikarṣaṇe yathākāmamavavādānuśāsanīprayogasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ
T06asabhs_u:2679: sarvākārasya yathāvat kṛtassa bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat
T06asabhs_u:2681: sarvajñasya sataḥ asarvajñaceṣṭitāsamudācārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2683: nirantaraṃ sarvaprakāraduḥkhālambanakaruṇāvihārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat
T06asabhs_u:2686: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ // asādhāraṇa kāyavāṅganaskarthapariśuddhi samṛddau sāśrayāṇāṃ saphalānāṃ tathāgatendriyāṇamaprāptyāmaparihāṇisamṛddhau asādhāraṇa karmasamudācārasamṛddhau asādhāraṇajñānavihārasamṛddhau ca yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:2688: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sarvākārajñatāsamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2690: viśuddhāni catvāri dhyānāni niśritya anyatīrthīyaḥ śrāvako bodhisattvo vā abhinirharati catvāri apramāṇānyevaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2691: śeṣān guṇān prāntakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya śrāvako bodhisattvastathāgato vābhinirharati // tatpunaḥ kimupādāya /
T06asabhs_u:2694: svakāritrapratyupasthānāśca vaihārikāśca // ye svakāritrapratyupasthānāḥ te lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhāḥ saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā draṣṭavyāḥ // ye punarvaihārikāste lokottarajñānasvabhāvā draṣṭavyāḥ apramāṇaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2696: anukampāvihāritayā puṇya saṃbhāraṃ paripūrayati sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate // vimokṣaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2698: śubhanirmāṇe na saṃkliśyate śānteṣu vimokṣeṣu na sajjati /
T06asabhs_u:2700: adhimucyanatā mupādāya // abhibhvāyatanaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2703: vimokṣālambanaṃ pariniṣpādayati kṛtsnaspharaṇatāmupādāya // araṇayā kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2704: ādeyavacano bhavati // praṇidhijñānena kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2705: bhūtabhavyavarttamānaṃ vyākaroti bahumataśca bhavati lokasya // pratisaṃvidbhiḥ kiṃ karma (Abhidh-s 100)
T06asabhs_u:2707: deśanayā sattvacittāni saṃtoṣayati // abhijñābhiḥ kiṃ karma
T06asabhs_u:2710: vākkarmaṇā cittādeśanayāvarjayati sattvacaritaṃ ca jñātvā āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca niḥsaraṇe sattvān yathāvadavavadate // lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2711: darśanamātrakeṇa mahāpuruṣatve saṃpratyayaṃ janayati cittānyabhiprasādayati // pariśuddhibhiḥ kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2713: ākāṅkṣayankalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā tiṣṭhati āyuḥsaṃskārān vā utsṛjati /
T06asabhs_u:2714: dharmavaśavarttī bhavati samādhivaśavartī saddharmaṃ ca sandhārayati // balaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti
T06asabhs_u:2715: ahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratyākhāyākṛtābhyāgamavāde ca samyaga bhyudayamārgaṃ deśayati sattvacittacaritāni cānupraviśya deśanābhājanatāṃ cāśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ cālambanaṃ ca saṃbhāraṃ ca bhavyatāṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca
T06asabhs_u:2717: sarvamārāṃśca nigṛṇhāti sarvatra ca praśnaṃ pṛcchati pṛṣṭo vyākaroti // vaiśāradyaiḥ kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2718: parṣadi samyagātmanaḥ śāstṛtvaṃ vyavasthāpahati codakāṃścānyatīrthyānnigṛṇhāti // smṛtyupasthānaiḥ kiṃ karma
T06asabhs_u:2719: gaṇamavavadate samanuśāsti // asaṃmoṣadharmatayā kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2720: buddhakṛtyaṃ na hāpayati // vāsanāsamudghātena kiṃ karma karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2721: niḥkleśaḥ kleśapratirūpāṃ ceṣṭānna(da)rśayati // mahākaruṇayā kiṃ karma
T06asabhs_u:2725: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān kāyavāṅmanaskarmapariśuddhyā prāptyā cāreṇa vihāreṇa vābhibhavati
T06asabhs_u:2727: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasaṃśayāṃ śchinatti dharmanetrīñca dīrghakālamavasthāpayati yena paripakṣā (? kṣyāḥ) sattvāḥ paripacyante paripakāśca vimucyante //
T06asabhs_u:2728: eṣvabhisamayeṣūttarottaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ labhamānaḥ pūrvakaṃ hīnaṃ mārgaṃ vijahāti saṃkalanaprahāṇaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti /
T06asabhs_u:2729: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau śrāvakaḥ sarvammārgasamavasargavihānyā vijahāti no tu bodhisattvaḥ // ataeva bodhisattvā akṣayakuśalamūlā akṣa(ya)guṇā
T06asabhs_u:2734: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvo bodhimanava vadyāmavakrāntaḥ strotāpanno na bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:2735: strotaḥpratipattyapariniṣpannatāmupādāya // kena kāraṇena sakṛdāgāmī na bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:2736: apramāṇasaṃcintya bhavopaprattiparigrahatāmupādāya // kena kāraṇenānāgāmī na bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:2738: bodhisattvaḥ satyānyabhi samayena labdhvā daśasu mūmiṣu bhāvanāmārgeṇa jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgaṃ bhāvayati na kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgam // tathā ca bodhiprāptaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca vijahāti arhan tathāgataśca saṃpadyate // sa ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvakleśāprahāṇāt mantroṣadhayo viṣamiva sarvakleśān abhibhavati sarvān kleśān doṣāṃśca notpādayati sarvāsu bhūmiṣu arhanniva kleśān prajahāti /
T06asabhs_u:2739: api khalu bodhisattvo jñeyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati upāyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati abhūtaparikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati nirvikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati tena kālena kālamindriyāṇyuttāpayati jñeyaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:2741: bhrāntiḥ bhrāntyāśrayaḥ abhrāntyāśrayaḥ bhrāntyabhrāntiḥ abhrāntiḥ abhrāntiniṣyandaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2745: sattvaparipākakauśalyaṃ buddhadharmaparipuraṇakauśalyaṃ kṣiprābhijñākauśalyaṃ mārgānupacchedakauśalyaṃ ca // abhūtaparikalpaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2747: mūlavikalpaḥ nimittivikalpaḥ nimittapratibhāsavikalpaḥ nimittavikāravikalpaḥ nimittipratibhāsavikāravikalpaḥ paropanītavikalpaḥ ayoniśovikalpaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2748: yoniśovikalpaḥ abhiniveśavikalpaḥ vikṣepavikalpaśca // sa punaḥ daśavidhaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2749: / abhāvavikalpa bhāvavikalpaḥ samāropavikalpaḥ apavādavikalpaḥ ekatvavi kalpaḥ pṛthaktvavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpaḥ viśeṣavikalpaḥ yathānāmārthavikalpaḥ yathārthanāmavikalpaśca // nirvikalpatā katamā /
T06asabhs_u:2751: santuṣṭinirvikalpatā aviparyāsanirghikalpatā niṣprapañcanirvikalpatā ca // tā imāstitraḥ pṛthagjanaśrāvakabodhisattvānāṃ yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ // yāsau nimittato niṣprapañcanirvikalpatā tasyāḥ punaḥ abhāvasya pañca nimittāni /
T06asabhs_u:2752: na amanasikārataḥ na manasikārasamatikramataḥ na vyupaśamataḥ na svabhāvataḥ na ālambane 'bhisaṃskārataśca
T06asabhs_u:2754: bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ indriyāpyuttāpayatīti /
T06asabhs_u:2761: arthaviniścayaḥ vyākhyāviniścayaḥ prabhidyasaṃdarśanaviniścayaḥ saṃpraśnaviniścayaḥ saṃgrahaviniścayaḥ vādaviniścayaḥ abhisandhiviniścayaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2765: svabhāvārthaḥ hetvarthaḥ phalārthaḥ karmārthaḥ yogārthaḥ vṛttyarthaśca // svabhāvārthastraṃyaḥ svabhāvāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2768: vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ adhipatiphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca // karmārthaḥ pañca karmāṇi /
T06asabhs_u:2769: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyāvasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca //
T06asabhs_u:2771: sāmūhiko yogaḥ ānubandhiko yogaḥ sāṃbandhiko yogaḥ āvasthiko yogaḥ vaikāriko yogaśca // vṛttyarthaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2774: yena sūtrāntān vyācaṣṭe // sa punaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2776: parijñeyavastu parijñeyo 'rthaḥ parijñopaniṣad parijñā parijñāphalam tatpravedanā ca // api khalu caturdaśa mukhāni vyākhyāviniścayasya /
T06asabhs_u:2778: vyākhyāsaṃgrahamukham vastusaṃgrahamukham aṅgopāṅgamukham uggarottaranirhāramukham pratikṣepamukham akṣarapariṇāmamukham nāśānāśamukham pudgalavyavasthānamukham prabhedavyavasthānamukham nayamukham parijñādimukham balā balamukham pratyāhāramukham abhinirhāramukhaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2780: yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacarakaḥ pūrvapadakaḥ paścātpadakaḥ dvikoṭikaḥ trikoṭikaḥ catuṣkoṭikaḥ oṃkāritaḥ prātikṣepika ityevamādayaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2789: kṛtyānuṣṭhānaviniścayasthānam avatāraviniścayasthānam adhimuktiviniścayasthānam yuktiviniścayasthānam sāṃkathyaviniścayasthānam prativedhaviniścayasthānam viśuddhiviniścayasthānam abhinirhārapadaprabhedaviniścayasthānam anābhogābhogamātrasarvārthasiddhiviniścayasthānaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:2792: vādaḥ vādādhikaraṇaṃ vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ bādālaṃkāraḥ vādanigrahaḥ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ bāde bahukarā dharmāśca //
T06asabhs_u:2794: vādaḥ pravādaḥ vivādaḥ apavādaḥ anuvāda avavāśca // vādaḥ sarvalokavacanam // pravādaḥ lokānuśruto vādaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2796: apavādaḥ parasparaṃ kopasaṃrambhapāruṣyanacanam // anuvādaḥ viśuddhajñānadarśanānukūlaḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayaḥ // avavādaḥ sattvānāṃ asamāhitacittānāṃ cittasamādhānāya samāhitacittānāṃ vimokṣalābhāya deśanāvādaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2797: dvitīyaṃ vādādhikaraṇaṃ rājakulaṃ vā prajākulaṃ vā prāmāṇikānāṃ sahāyakānāṃ dharmārthakuśalānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ nādasabhā vā /
T06asabhs_u:2805: pratijñā hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ anumānaṃ āptāgamaśca // sādhyasya svabhāvaḥ ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvo vā /
T06asabhs_u:2806: viśeṣaḥ ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣo vā // pratijñā sādhyasya svarucitārthasya parasaṃprāpaṇavijñāpanā
T06asabhs_u:2807: hetuḥ tasminneva sādhye apratītasyārthasya saṃpratyayanimittaṃ pratyakṣopalambhānupalambhasamākhyānam // dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa antena adṛṣṭāsya antasya samīkaraṇasamākhyānam // upanayaḥ śiṣṭatajjātīya rmmāpagamāya
T06asabhs_u:2811: caturtho vādālaṃkāraḥ vādādhiṣṭhāne samyagyuktibhiḥ vādasabhāyāṃ gambhīro nipuṇaśca bhavatīti vādālaṃkāra ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:2813: svaparasamayajñatā vākkaraṇasaṃpad vaiśaradyaṃ pratibhānaṃ sthairyaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2814: pañcamo vādanigrahaḥ kathātyāgaḥ kathāsādaḥ kathādoṣaśca // kathātyāgaḥ svāvādadoṣābhyupagamaḥ paravāaguṇābhyupagamaśca // kathāsādaḥ anyavastupratisaraṇena vyāvṛttiḥ bāhyavastuvacanena mūlaparatijñāparityāgaḥ krodhamadamānamrākṣādi pradarśanaṃ ca // yathoktaṃ sūtre /
T06asabhs_u:2816: ākulaṃ saṃrabdham agamakam amitam anarthakam akālam asthiram apradīptam apravaddhaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2817: ṣaṣṭhaṃ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ guṇadoṣau vicārya vādānniḥsaratyakaraṇena vā prativādityabhājanatāṃ parṣado vaiguṇyamātmano 'kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ
T06asabhs_u:2819: prativādini bhājanatāṃ parṣado guṇavattvamātmanaḥ kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ karoti //
T06asabhs_u:2822: svaparasamayajñatā yayā sarvatra nipuṇo vādaṃ karoti /
T06asabhs_u:2823: vaiśāradyaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ samagraparṣadi vādaṃ karoti
T06asabhs_u:2824: / pratimānaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ sarvāṃn kaṭhinān praśnān vyākaroti //
T06asabhs_u:2825: api khalu svahitasukha kāmena vādeṣu abhijñātuṃ pravarttitavyaṃ na paraiḥ vivādaṃ kartum /
T06asabhs_u:2827: bodhisattvena vīryamārabhamāṇena kuśalapakṣaprayuktena pratipattisārakeṇa dharmānudharmacāriṇā sarvasattvasaṃgrāhakeṇa kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyatā dvādaśasthānadharmān samanupaśyatā na paraiḥ saha vivādaḥ kāryaḥ // katame dvādaśa /
T06asabhs_u:2841: nirantaraṃ kuśaladharme 'bhāvite tu asamāhicittasya kṣipraṃ samādhilābhaḥ samāhitacittasya
T06asabhs_u:2848: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā rājānaṃ dvau bahuśrutau /
T06asabhs_u:2849: rāṣṭraṃ sānucaraṃ hatvā naro viśuddha ucyate //
T06asabhs_u:2856: api coktaṃ sūtre bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato dānapāra mitāyāṃ kṣipraṃ paripūriṃ labhate /
T06asabhs_u:2862: dūre ca bhavati dānasya // punaścoktaṃ sūtre /
T06asabhs_u:2863: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcadharmasamanvāgato brahmacārī bhavati parameṇa viśuddhena brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgataḥ // katame pañca // nānyatra maithunyānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate /
